12046938Di2015UniqueSeparator// Variables to save our dataDi2015NewLine// numberValues - number of values user needs to enterDi2015NewLine// pressureList - list of entered pressure dataDi2015NewLine// weightList - list of entered weight dataDi2015NewLineint numberValues = 100;Di2015NewLineList<int> pressureList = new List<int>();Di2015NewLineList<int> weightList = new List<int>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Method that is called on user submit button clickDi2015NewLine// This method uses only one text box to input data,Di2015NewLine// first we input pressure data until limit is reached Di2015NewLine// and then weight dataDi2015NewLineprivate void HandleSubmit(object sender, EventArgs args) {Di2015NewLine    // Check if we are still entering pressure data, thatDi2015NewLine    // is until we reach numberValues of pressure data valuesDi2015NewLine    // Same thing goes for weight listDi2015NewLine    if (pressureList.Count < numberValues) {Di2015NewLine        pressureList.Add(Int32.Parse(textBox1.Text));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    else if (weightList.Count < numberValues) {Di2015NewLine        weightList.Add(Int32.Parse(textBox1.Text));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    else {Di2015NewLine        // When we have #numberValues of values in both Di2015NewLine        // lists we can call custom method to process dataDi2015NewLine        CUSTOMMETHOD(pressureList, weightList);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Method for processing dataDi2015NewLineprivate void CUSTOMMETHOD(List<int> pressures, List<int> weights) {Di2015NewLine    // This loop will go through all values collected andDi2015NewLine    // will give you access to both pressure and weight onDi2015NewLine    // each iterationDi2015NewLine    for (int index = 0; 12050410Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic struct AABBDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public float X, Y, Width, Height;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static AABB Intersect(AABB a, AABB b)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        AABB result;Di2015NewLine        result.X = Math.Max(a.X, b.X);Di2015NewLine        result.Y = Math.Max(a.Y, b.Y);Di2015NewLine        result.Width = Math.Min(a.X + a.Width, b.X + b.Width) - result.X;Di2015NewLine        result.Height = Math.Min(a.Y + a.Height, b.Y + b.Height) - result.Y;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if(result.Width < 0 || result.Height < 0)Di2015NewLine            return default(AABB);Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            return result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12061653Di2015UniqueSeparator// changed to take TV as a parameter.Di2015NewLineprivate void countDown(TreeView tv, int num)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Create and remember your root node.Di2015NewLine    var root = new TreeNode("root");Di2015NewLine    tv.Nodes.Add(root);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // This to remember the last 'grouping node' created.  Start withDi2015NewLine    // the root node to deal with starting values not divisible by 10.Di2015NewLine    TreeNode group = root;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for ( int i=num; i>0; i--)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Is it divisble by 10, if so, start a new group Di2015NewLine        if (num % 10 == 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            group = new TreeNode(i.ToString());Di2015NewLine            root.Nodes.Add(group);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {  Di2015NewLine            // Not divisible, so add to last group (or root if no Di2015NewLine            // group yet started) Di2015NewLine            group.Nodes.Add(i.ToString());Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12069161Di2015UniqueSeparatorRandom
12069161Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Generates a salt for use with the Hash method.Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="length">The length of string to generate.</param>Di2015NewLine/// <returns>A random salt.</returns>Di2015NewLinepublic static string GenerateSalt(int length) {Di2015NewLine    // Check the length isn't too short.Di2015NewLine    if (length < MIN_LENGTH) {Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("length", "Please increase the salt length to meet the minimum acceptable value of " + MIN_LENGTH + " characters.");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Where we'll put our generated salt.Di2015NewLine    StringBuilder salt = new StringBuilder(length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Fill our string with random characters.Di2015NewLine    Random rnd = new Random();Di2015NewLine    string chars = "0123456798ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz";Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < length; i++) {Di2015NewLine      salt.Append(chars[rnd.Next(chars.Length)]);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Return the salt.Di2015NewLine    return salt.ToString();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12073811Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void AddCenteredImage(ImageList list, Image image) {Di2015NewLine    using (var bmp = new Bitmap(list.ImageSize.Width, list.ImageSize.Height))Di2015NewLine    using (var gr = Graphics.FromImage(bmp)) {Di2015NewLine        gr.Clear(Color.Transparent);   // Change background if necessaryDi2015NewLine        var size = image.Size;Di2015NewLine        if (size.Width > list.ImageSize.Width || size.Height > list.ImageSize.Height) {Di2015NewLine            // Image too large, rescale to fit the image listDi2015NewLine            double wratio = list.ImageSize.Width / size.Width;Di2015NewLine            double hratio = list.ImageSize.Height / size.Height;Di2015NewLine            double ratio = Math.Min(wratio, hratio);Di2015NewLine            size = new Size((int)(ratio * size.Width), (int)(ratio * size.Height));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        var rc = new Rectangle(Di2015NewLine            (list.ImageSize.Width - size.Width) / 2,Di2015NewLine            (list.ImageSize.Height - size.Height) / 2,Di2015NewLine            size.Width, size.Height);Di2015NewLine        gr.DrawImage(image, rc);Di2015NewLine        list.Images.Add(bmp);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12074646Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic object NullableSafeChangeType(string input, Type type)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Type underlyingType = Nullable.GetUnderlyingType(type);Di2015NewLine    if (underlyingType == null) // Non-nullable; convert directlyDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return Convert.ChangeType(input, type);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return input == null || input == "" ? nullDi2015NewLine            : Convert.ChangeType(input, underlyingType);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12077107Di2015UniqueSeparatornamespace AppLibDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /// <summary> Di2015NewLine    /// Entry point for library. Stage manages all the actors in the logic. Di2015NewLine    /// </summary> Di2015NewLine    class StageAppDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        /// <summary> Di2015NewLine        /// Setting that is looked up by different actors Di2015NewLine        /// </summary> Di2015NewLine        public int SharedSetting { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary> Di2015NewLine        /// Stage managing actors with app logic Di2015NewLine        /// </summary> Di2015NewLine        public IEnumerable<Actor> Actors { get { return m_actors.Where(x => x.Execute() > 40).ToArray(); } }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private List<Actor> m_actors = new List<Actor>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public int TotalActorsCountDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            getDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return m_actors.Count;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void AddActor(Actor actor)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (actor == null)Di2015NewLine                throw new ArgumentNullException("actor");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (m_actors.Contains(actor))Di2015NewLine                return; // or throw an exceptionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            m_actors.Add(actor);Di2015NewLine            if (actor.Stage != this)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                actor.Stage = this;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // we are hiding this method, to avoid because we can change Stage only to another non null valueDi2015NewLine        // so calling this method directly is not allowedDi2015NewLine        internal void RemoveActor(Actor actor)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (actor == null)Di2015NewLine                throw new ArgumentNullException("actor");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (!m_actors.Contains(actor))Di2015NewLine                return; // or throuw exceptionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            m_actors.Remove(actor);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary> Di2015NewLine    /// An object on the stage. Refers to stage (shared)settings and execute depending on the settings. Di2015NewLine    /// Hence actor should have reference to stage Di2015NewLine    /// </summary> Di2015NewLine    class ActorDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private StageApp m_StageApp;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private int m_Property;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public StageApp StageDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            getDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return m_StageApp;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            setDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (value == null)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    throw new ArgumentNullException("value");Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                if (m_StageApp != value)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (m_StageApp != null) // not a call from ctorDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        m_StageApp.RemoveActor(this);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    m_StageApp = value;Di2015NewLine                    m_StageApp.AddActor(this);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary> Di2015NewLine        /// An actor that needs to refer to stage to know what behavior to execute Di2015NewLine        /// </summary> Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="stage"></param> Di2015NewLine        public Actor(StageApp stage)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Stage = stage;Di2015NewLine            m_Property = new Random().Next();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary> Di2015NewLine        /// Execute according to stage settings Di2015NewLine        /// </summary> Di2015NewLine        /// <returns></returns> Di2015NewLine        public int Execute()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return m_StageApp.SharedSetting * m_Property;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace AppExeDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    using AppLib;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            StageApp app = new StageApp();Di2015NewLine            app.SharedSetting = 5;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            StageApp anotherApp = new StageApp();Di2015NewLine            anotherApp.SharedSetting = 6;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // actor is added to the stage automatically after instantiationDi2015NewLine in anotherApp before moving actor:");Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(anotherApp.TotalActorsCount);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // or by calling method from StageApp         Console.WriteLine("Actors in anotherApp after setting property of Actor instance (should be 3):");Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(anotherApp.TotalActorsCount);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Actors count in app (should be empty):");Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(app.TotalActorsCount);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12079846Di2015UniqueSeparatorDisplayModeAttribute
12079846Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System.ComponentModel;Di2015NewLineusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Windows.Forms;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine[AttributeUsage(AttributeTargets.Property, AllowMultiple = false, Inherited = true)]Di2015NewLinepublic class DisplayModeAttribute : AttributeDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly string mode;Di2015NewLine    public DisplayModeAttribute(string mode)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.mode = mode ?? "";Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public override bool Match(object obj)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var other = obj as DisplayModeAttribute;Di2015NewLine        if (other == null) return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (other.mode == mode) return true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // allow for a comma-separated match, in either directionDi2015NewLine        if (mode.IndexOf(',') >= 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string[] tokens = mode.Split(',');Di2015NewLine            if (Array.IndexOf(tokens, other.mode) >= 0) return true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (other.mode.IndexOf(',') >= 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string[] tokens = other.mode.Split(',');Di2015NewLine            if (Array.IndexOf(tokens, mode) >= 0) return true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class AppSettingsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    [DisplayMode("A"), CategoryAttribute("Document Settings"), DefaultValueAttribute(true)]Di2015NewLine    public bool SaveOnClose { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    [DisplayMode("A,B")]Di2015NewLine    [CategoryAttribute("Global Settings"), ReadOnlyAttribute(true), DefaultValueAttribute("Welcome to AppDev!")]Di2015NewLine    public string GreetingText { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    [DisplayMode("B"), BrowsableAttribute(true), DescriptionAttribute("The rate in milliseconds that the text will repeat."), CategoryAttribute("Global Settings"), DefaultValueAttribute(10)]Di2015NewLine    public int MaxRepeatRate { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    [BrowsableAttribute(true), CategoryAttribute("Global Settings"), DefaultValueAttribute(4)]Di2015NewLine    public int ItemsInMRUList { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    [BrowsableAttribute(true), DefaultValueAttribute(false)]Di2015NewLine    public bool SettingsChanged { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    [BrowsableAttribute(true), CategoryAttribute("Version"), DefaultValueAttribute("1.0"), ReadOnlyAttribute(true)]Di2015NewLine    public string AppVersion { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinestatic class ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    [STAThread]Di2015NewLine    static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        using (var form = new Form())Di2015NewLine        using (var grid = new PropertyGrid())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            grid.Dock = DockStyle.Fill;Di2015NewLine            grid.SelectedObject = new AppSettings();Di2015NewLine            grid.BrowsableAttributes = new AttributeCollection(Di2015NewLine                new DisplayModeAttribute("A"));Di2015NewLine            form.Controls.Add(grid);Di2015NewLine            form.ShowDialog();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            grid.BrowsableAttributes = new AttributeCollection(Di2015NewLine                new DisplayModeAttribute("B"));Di2015NewLine            form.ShowDialog();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12080706Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic void Main( string[] args ) {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    string fullName = "Outer<blah<int,string>,int,blah<int,int>>";          Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Regex regex = new Regex( @"([a-zA-Z\\._]+)\\<(.+)\\>$" );Di2015NewLine    Match m = regex.Match( fullName );Di2015NewLine    string frontName = m.Groups[1].Value;Di2015NewLine    string inner = m.Groups[2].Value;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var genArgs = ParseInnerGenericArgs( inner );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach( string s in genArgs ) {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(s);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    Console.ReadKey();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static IEnumerable<string> ParseInnerGenericArgs( string inner ) {Di2015NewLine    List<string> pieces = new List<string>();Di2015NewLine    int angleCount = 0;Di2015NewLine    StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine    for( int i = 0; i < inner.Length; i++ ) {Di2015NewLine        string currChar = inner[i].ToString();Di2015NewLine        if( currChar == ">" ) {Di2015NewLine            angleCount--;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if( currChar == "<" ) {Di2015NewLine            angleCount++;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if( currChar == ","  &&  angleCount > 0 ) {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            sb.Append( "~" );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        } else {Di2015NewLine            sb.Append( currChar );Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    foreach( string item in sb.ToString().Split( ',' ) ) {Di2015NewLine        pieces.Add(item.Replace('~',','));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return pieces;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12081767Di2015UniqueSeparator    double sourceAngle;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    ...Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void AudioSourceBeamChanged(object sender, BeamAngleChangedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        beamRotation.Angle = -e.Angle;Di2015NewLine        sourceAngle = e.Angle;Di2015NewLine        beamAngleText.Text = string.Format(CultureInfo.CurrentCulture, Properties.Resources.BeamAngle, e.Angle.ToString("0", CultureInfo.CurrentCulture));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void AudioSourceBeamChanged(object sender, BeamAngleChangedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        beamRotation.Angle = -e.Angle;Di2015NewLine        beamAngleText.Text = string.Format(CultureInfo.CurrentCulture, Properties.Resources.BeamAngle, e.Angle.ToString("0", CultureInfo.CurrentCulture));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void AudioReadingThread()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Bottom portion of computed energy signal that will be discarded as noise.Di2015NewLine        // Only portion of signal above noise floor will be displayed.Di2015NewLine        const double EnergyNoiseFloor = 0.2;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        while (this.reading)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            while (sourceAngle == 0) //this is the important partDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                int readCount = audioStream.Read(audioBuffer, 0, audioBuffer.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Calculate energy corresponding to captured audio in the dispatcherDi2015NewLine                // (UI Thread) context, so that rendering code doesn't need toDi2015NewLine                // perform additional synchronization.Di2015NewLine                Dispatcher.BeginInvoke(Di2015NewLine                new Action(Di2015NewLine                    () =>Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        for (int i = 0; i < readCount; i += 2)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            // compute the sum of squares of audio samples that will get accumulatedDi2015NewLine                            // into a single energy value.Di2015NewLine                            short audioSample = BitConverter.ToInt16(audioBuffer, i);Di2015NewLine                            this.accumulatedSquareSum += audioSample * audioSample;Di2015NewLine                            ++this.accumulatedSampleCount;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                            if (this.accumulatedSampleCount < SamplesPerColumn)Di2015NewLine                            {Di2015NewLine                                continue;Di2015NewLine                            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                            // Each energy value will represent the logarithm of the mean of theDi2015NewLine                            // sum of squares of a group of audio samples.Di2015NewLine                            double meanSquare = this.accumulatedSquareSum / SamplesPerColumn;Di2015NewLine                            double amplitude = Math.Log(meanSquare) / Math.Log(int.MaxValue);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                            // Renormalize signal above noise floor to [0,1] range.Di2015NewLine                            this.energy[this.energyIndex] = Math.Max(0, amplitude - EnergyNoiseFloor) / (1 - EnergyNoiseFloor);Di2015NewLine                            this.energyIndex = (this.energyIndex + 1) % this.energy.Length;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                            this.accumulatedSquareSum = 0;Di2015NewLine                            this.accumulatedSampleCount = 0;Di2015NewLine                            ++this.newEnergyAvailable;Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

12082015Di2015UniqueSeparatoropen System.Collections.SpecializedDi2015NewLineopen System.Collections.ObjectModelDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinemodule ObservableCollection =Di2015NewLine  /// Initialize observable collectionDi2015NewLine  let init n f = ObservableCollection<_>(List.init n f)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  /// Incremental map for observable collectionsDi2015NewLine  let map f (oc:ObservableCollection<'T>) =Di2015NewLine    // Create a resulting collection based on current elementsDi2015NewLine    let res = ObservableCollection<_>(Seq.map f oc)Di2015NewLine    // Watch for changes in the source collectionDi2015NewLine    oc.CollectionChanged.Add(fun change ->Di2015NewLine      printfn "%A" change.ActionDi2015NewLine      match change.Action withDi2015NewLine      | NotifyCollectionChangedAction.Add ->Di2015NewLine          // Apply 'f' to all new elements and add them to the resultDi2015NewLine          change.NewItems |> Seq.cast<'T> |> Seq.iteri (fun index item ->Di2015NewLine            res.Insert(change.NewStartingIndex + index, f item))Di2015NewLine      | NotifyCollectionChangedAction.Move ->Di2015NewLine          // Move element in the resulting collectionDi2015NewLine          res.Move(change.OldStartingIndex, change.NewStartingIndex)Di2015NewLine      | NotifyCollectionChangedAction.Remove ->Di2015NewLine          // Remove element in the resultDi2015NewLine          res.RemoveAt(change.OldStartingIndex)Di2015NewLine      | NotifyCollectionChangedAction.Replace -> Di2015NewLine          // Replace element with a new one (processed using 'f')Di2015NewLine          change.NewItems |> Seq.cast<'T> |> Seq.iteri (fun index item ->Di2015NewLine            res.[change.NewStartingIndex + index] <- f item)Di2015NewLine      | NotifyCollectionChangedAction.Reset ->Di2015NewLine          // Clear everythingDi2015NewLine          res.Clear()Di2015NewLine      | _ -> failwith "Unexpected action!" )Di2015NewLine    resDi2015NewLine

12086503Di2015UniqueSeparatorstring sample = "Stargate.SG-1.S01E08.iNT.DVDRip.XviD-LOCK.avi";Di2015NewLineRegex  regex  = new Regex(@"S(?<season>\\d{1,2})E(?<episode>\\d{1,2})");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineMatch match = regex.Match(sample);Di2015NewLineif (match.Success)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string season  = match.Groups["season"].Value;Di2015NewLine    string episode = match.Groups["episode"].Value;Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("Season: " + season + ", Episode: " + episode);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineelseDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("No match!");Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
12086503Di2015UniqueSeparatorS                // match 'S'Di2015NewLine(                // start of a capture groupDi2015NewLine    ?<season>    // name of the capture group: seasonDi2015NewLine    \\d{1,2}      // match 1 to 2 digitsDi2015NewLine)                // end of the capture groupDi2015NewLineE                // match 'E'Di2015NewLine(                // start of a capture groupDi2015NewLine    ?<episode>   // name of the capture group: episodeDi2015NewLine    \\d{1,2}      // match 1 to 2 digitsDi2015NewLine)                // end of the capture groupDi2015NewLine

12092142Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineusing System.Windows.Forms;Di2015NewLineusing System.Runtime.InteropServices;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic class DialogCloser {Di2015NewLine    public static void Execute() {Di2015NewLine        // Enumerate windows to find dialogsDi2015NewLine        EnumThreadWndProc callback = new EnumThreadWndProc(checkWindow);Di2015NewLine        EnumThreadWindows(GetCurrentThreadId(), callback, IntPtr.Zero);Di2015NewLine        GC.KeepAlive(callback);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static bool checkWindow(IntPtr hWnd, IntPtr lp) {Di2015NewLine        // Checks if <hWnd> is a Windows dialogDi2015NewLine        StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder(260);Di2015NewLine        GetClassName(hWnd, sb, sb.Capacity);Di2015NewLine        if (sb.ToString() == "#32770") {Di2015NewLine            // Close it by sending WM_CLOSE to the windowDi2015NewLine            SendMessage(hWnd, 0x0010, IntPtr.Zero, IntPtr.Zero);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // P/Invoke declarationsDi2015NewLine    private delegate bool EnumThreadWndProc(IntPtr hWnd, IntPtr lp);Di2015NewLine    [DllImport("user32.dll")]Di2015NewLine    private static extern bool EnumThreadWindows(int tid, EnumThreadWndProc callback, IntPtr lp);Di2015NewLine    [DllImport("kernel32.dll")]Di2015NewLine    private static extern int GetCurrentThreadId();Di2015NewLine    [DllImport("user32.dll")]Di2015NewLine    private static extern int GetClassName(IntPtr hWnd, StringBuilder buffer, int buflen);Di2015NewLine    [DllImport("user32.dll")]Di2015NewLine    private static extern IntPtr SendMessage(IntPtr hWnd, int msg, IntPtr wp, IntPtr lp);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12094070Di2015UniqueSeparatorstring[] ignoreAssembyVersions = new string[] { "log4net" };Di2015NewLineAppDomain.CurrentDomain.AssemblyResolve += (_, assembly) =>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //ignore the vesion number and return any version that has been loadedDi2015NewLine    var name = new AssemblyName(assembly.Name);Di2015NewLine    var shortName = name.Name; // retrieve short nameDi2015NewLine    if (ignoreAssembyVersions.Contains(shortName)) // compare against list of assemblies we ignore revisions forDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // check if this assembly is already loaded under a different version #Di2015NewLine        Assembly[] allAss = AppDomain.CurrentDomain.GetAssemblies();Di2015NewLine        List<Assembly> list = new List<Assembly>(allAss);Di2015NewLine        var loadedAssembly = list.Find(ass => new AssemblyName(ass.FullName).Name == shortName); // check if we have any version loaded yetDi2015NewLine        if (loadedAssembly != null)Di2015NewLine            return loadedAssembly;Di2015NewLine        else // assembly has not yet been loaded in this domainDi2015NewLine        {   // probe for assembly by nameDi2015NewLine            Assembly probedAssembly = Assembly.LoadFrom(string.Format("{0}.dll", shortName)); // probe for any match on assembly.dll Di2015NewLine            return probedAssembly;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return null; // ignore binding failure -> pass up the stackDi2015NewLine};Di2015NewLine

12097800Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class StackOverflow_12089879Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    [ServiceContract(SessionMode = SessionMode.Required)]Di2015NewLine    public interface IStackCalculatorDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        [OperationContract]Di2015NewLine        void Enter(double value);Di2015NewLine        [OperationContract]Di2015NewLine        double Add();Di2015NewLine        [OperationContract]Di2015NewLine        double Subtract();Di2015NewLine        [OperationContract]Di2015NewLine        double Multiply();Di2015NewLine stack = new Stack<double>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void Enter(double value)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Entering {0}", value);Di2015NewLine            stack.Push(value);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public double Add()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return Execute("Add", (x, y) => x + y);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public double Subtract()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return Execute("Subtract", (x, y) => x - y);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public double Multiply()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return Execute("Multiply", (x, y) => x * y);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public double Divide()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return Execute("Divide", (x, y) => x / y);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private double Execute(string operationName, Func<double, double, double> operation)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            double first = stack.Pop();Di2015NewLine            double second = stack.Pop();Di2015NewLine            double result = operation(first, second);Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Executing {0}({1}, {2}), result = {3}", operationName, first, second, result);Di2015NewLine            stack.Push(result);Di2015NewLine            return result;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    static Binding GetBinding()Di2015NewLine 12098080Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate enum WORD_FORMATDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    NUMBER = 0,Di2015NewLine    ARRAY = 1,Di2015NewLine    ASSOC = 2Di2015NewLine};Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static object str_word_count(string str, WORD_FORMAT format, string charlist)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string wordchars = string.Format("{0}{1}", "a-z", Regex.Escape(charlist));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var words = Regex.Matches(str, string.Format("[{0}]+(?:[{0}'\\\\-]+[{0}])?", wordchars), RegexOptions.Compiled | RegexOptions.IgnoreCase);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (format == WORD_FORMAT.ASSOC)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var assoc = new Dictionary<int, string>(words.Count);Di2015NewLine        foreach (Match m in words)Di2015NewLine            assoc.Add(m.Index, m.Value);Di2015NewLine        return assoc;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    else if (format == WORD_FORMAT.ARRAY)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return words.Cast<Match>().Select(m => m.Value).ToArray();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    else // default to number.Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return words.Count;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
12098080Di2015UniqueSeparatorDictionary<int,string>
12098080Di2015UniqueSeparatorASSOC
12098080Di2015UniqueSeparatorstring[]
12098080Di2015UniqueSeparatorARRAY
12098080Di2015UniqueSeparatorint
12098080Di2015UniqueSeparatorNUMBER
12098080Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string sentence = @"Hello fri3nd, you'reDi2015NewLine   looking          good today!";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var assoc = (Dictionary<int,string>)str_word_count(sentence, WORD_FORMAT.ASSOC, string.Empty);Di2015NewLine    var array = (string[])str_word_count(sentence, WORD_FORMAT.ARRAY, string.Empty);Di2015NewLine    var number = (int)str_word_count(sentence, WORD_FORMAT.NUMBER, string.Empty);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //test the plain arrayDi2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("Array\\n(");Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < array.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("\\t[{0}] => {1}", i, array[i]);Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine(")");Di2015NewLine    // test the associativeDi2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("Array\\n(");Di2015NewLine    foreach (var kvp in assoc)Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("\\t[{0}] => {1}", kvp.Key, kvp.Value);Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine(")");Di2015NewLine    //test the charlist:Di2015NewLine    array = (string[])str_word_count(sentence, WORD_FORMAT.ARRAY, "3");Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("Array\\n(");Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < array.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("\\t[{0}] => {1}", i, array[i]);Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine(")");Di2015NewLine    //test the numberDi2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("\\n{0}", number);Di2015NewLine    Console.Read();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12099457Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic string Replace(input, replacement)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // find all the tagsDi2015NewLine    var regex = new Regex("(\\[(?:position|/?item)\\])");Di2015NewLine    var matches = regex.Matches(input);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // loop through the tags and build up the output stringDi2015NewLine    var builder = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine    int lastIndex = 0;Di2015NewLine    int nestingLevel = 0;Di2015NewLine    foreach(var match in matches)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // append everything since the last tag;Di2015NewLine        builder.Append(input.Substring(lastIndex, (match.Index - lastIndex) + 1));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        switch(match.Value)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            case "[item]":Di2015NewLine                nestingLevel++;Di2015NewLine                builder.Append(match.Value);Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case "[/item]":Di2015NewLine                nestingLevel--;Di2015NewLine                builder.Append(match.Value);Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case "[position]":Di2015NewLine                // Append the replacement text if we're outside of any [item]/[/item] pairsDi2015NewLine                // Otherwise append the tagDi2015NewLine                builder.Append(nestingLevel == 0 ? replacement : match.Value);Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        lastIndex = match.Index + match.Length;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    builder.Append(input.Substring(lastIndex));Di2015NewLine    return builder.ToString();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12100206Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class InputExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static MvcHtmlString CheckBoxFor<TModel, TProperty>(this HtmlHelper<TModel> htmlHelper, Expression<Func<TModel, TProperty>> expression, object value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return htmlHelper.CheckBoxFor<TModel, TProperty>(expression, value, null);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static MvcHtmlString CheckBoxFor<TModel, TProperty>(this HtmlHelper<TModel> htmlHelper, Expression<Func<TModel, TProperty>> expression, object value, object htmlAttributes)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return htmlHelper.CheckBoxFor<TModel, TProperty>(expression, value, HtmlHelper.AnonymousObjectToHtmlAttributes(htmlAttributes));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static MvcHtmlString CheckBoxFor<TModel, TProperty>(this HtmlHelper<TModel> htmlHelper, Expression<Func<TModel, TProperty>> expression, object value, IDictionary<string, object> htmlAttributes)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ModelMetadata modelMetadata = ModelMetadata.FromLambdaExpression<TModel, TProperty>(expression, htmlHelper.ViewData);Di2015NewLine        return CheckBoxHelper<TModel, TProperty>(htmlHelper, modelMetadata, modelMetadata.Model, ExpressionHelper.GetExpressionText(expression), value, htmlAttributes);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static MvcHtmlString CheckBoxHelper<TModel, TProperty>(HtmlHelper htmlHelper, ModelMetadata metadata, object model, string name, object value, IDictionary<string, object> htmlAttributes)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (value == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentNullException("value");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        RouteValueDictionary routeValueDictionary = htmlAttributes != null ? new RouteValueDictionary(htmlAttributes) : new RouteValueDictionary();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string fullHtmlFieldName = htmlHelper.ViewContext.ViewData.TemplateInfo.GetFullHtmlFieldName(name);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(fullHtmlFieldName))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentException("Le nom du control doit tre fourni", "name");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        TagBuilder tagBuilder = new TagBuilder("input");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        tagBuilder.MergeAttributes<string, object>(htmlAttributes);Di2015NewLine        tagBuilder.MergeAttribute("type", HtmlHelper.GetInputTypeString(InputType.CheckBox));Di2015NewLine        tagBuilder.MergeAttribute("name", fullHtmlFieldName, true);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string text = Convert.ToString(value, CultureInfo.CurrentCulture);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        tagBuilder.MergeAttribute("value", text);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (metadata.Model != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            foreach (var item in metadata.Model as System.Collections.IEnumerable)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (Convert.ToString(item, CultureInfo.CurrentCulture).Equals(text))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    tagBuilder.Attributes.Add("checked", "checked");Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return MvcHtmlString.Create(tagBuilder.ToString(TagRenderMode.SelfClosing));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12106514Di2015UniqueSeparatorEnsureInitialized
12106514Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void EnsureInitialized(IBuildManager buildManager) {Di2015NewLine    if (_cache == null) {Di2015NewLine        lock (_lockObj) {Di2015NewLine            if (_cache == null) {Di2015NewLine                List<Type> controllerTypes = TypeCacheUtil.GetFilteredTypesFromAssemblies(_typeCacheName, IsControllerType, buildManager);Di2015NewLine                var groupedByName = controllerTypes.GroupBy(Di2015NewLine                    t => t.Name.Substring(0, t.Name.Length - "Controller".Length),Di2015NewLine                    StringComparer.OrdinalIgnoreCase);Di2015NewLine                _cache = groupedByName.ToDictionary(Di2015NewLine                    g => g.Key,Di2015NewLine                    g => g.ToLookup(t => t.Namespace ?? String.Empty, StringComparer.OrdinalIgnoreCase),Di2015NewLine                    StringComparer.OrdinalIgnoreCase);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
12106514Di2015UniqueSeparator_cache
12106514Di2015UniqueSeparatorTypeCacheUtil.GetFilteredTypesFromAssemblies
12106514Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static List<Type> GetFilteredTypesFromAssemblies(string cacheName, Predicate<Type> predicate, IBuildManager buildManager) {Di2015NewLine    TypeCacheSerializer serializer = new TypeCacheSerializer();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // first, try reading from the cache on diskDi2015NewLine    List<Type> matchingTypes = ReadTypesFromCache(cacheName, predicate, buildManager, serializer);Di2015NewLine    if (matchingTypes != null) {Di2015NewLine        return matchingTypes;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // if reading from the cache failed, enumerate over every assembly looking for a matching typeDi2015NewLine    matchingTypes = FilterTypesInAssemblies(buildManager, predicate).ToList();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // finally, save the cache back to diskDi2015NewLine    SaveTypesToCache(cacheName, matchingTypes, buildManager, serializer);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return matchingTypes;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12106514Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class ControllerTypeCacheDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private static object _syncRoot = new object();Di2015NewLine    private static Type[] _cache;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static IEnumerable<Type> GetControllerTypes()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (_cache == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            lock (_syncRoot)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (_cache == null)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    _cache = GetControllerTypesWithReflection();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return new ReadOnlyCollection<Type>(_cache);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static Type[] GetControllerTypesWithReflection()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var typesSoFar = Type.EmptyTypes;Di2015NewLine        var assemblies = BuildManager.GetReferencedAssemblies();Di2015NewLine        foreach (Assembly assembly in assemblies) Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Type[] typesInAsm;Di2015NewLine            try Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                typesInAsm = assembly.GetTypes();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (ReflectionTypeLoadException ex) Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                typesInAsm = ex.Types;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            typesSoFar = typesSoFar.Concat(typesInAsm).ToArray();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return typesSoFarDi2015NewLine            .Where(t => t != null && Di2015NewLine                        t.IsPublic && Di2015NewLine                        !t.IsAbstract && Di2015NewLine                        typeof(IController).IsAssignableFrom(t)Di2015NewLine            )Di2015NewLine            .ToArray();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12108052Di2015UniqueSeparatorFastZip
12108052Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void ExtractZipFile(string archiveFilenameIn, string outFolder) {Di2015NewLine    ZipFile zf = null;Di2015NewLine    try {Di2015NewLine        FileStream fs = File.OpenRead(archiveFilenameIn);Di2015NewLine        zf = new ZipFile(fs);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (ZipEntry zipEntry in zf) {Di2015NewLine            if (!zipEntry.IsFile) continue; // Ignore directoriesDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            String entryFileName = zipEntry.Name;Di2015NewLine            // to remove the folder from the entry:Di2015NewLine            // entryFileName = Path.GetFileName(entryFileName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            byte[] buffer = new byte[4096];     // 4K is optimumDi2015NewLine            Stream zipStream = zf.GetInputStream(zipEntry);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Manipulate the output filename here as desired.Di2015NewLine            String fullZipToPath = Path.Combine(outFolder, entryFileName);Di2015NewLine            string directoryName = Path.GetDirectoryName(fullZipToPath);Di2015NewLine            if (directoryName.Length > 0)Di2015NewLine                Directory.CreateDirectory(directoryName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            using (FileStream streamWriter = File.Create(fullZipToPath)) {Di2015NewLine                StreamUtils.Copy(zipStream, streamWriter, buffer);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    } finally {Di2015NewLine        if (zf != null) {Di2015NewLine            zf.IsStreamOwner = true;streamDi2015NewLine            zf.Close();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12109304Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar deg = 90.0;Di2015NewLinevar rads = deg * (Math.PI / 180);Di2015NewLinevar result = Math.Tan(rads);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineif (Double.IsInfinity(result))Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("Tan of 90 degrees is Infinity");Di2015NewLineelse if (Double.IsNaN(result))Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("Tan of 90 degrees is Undefined");Di2015NewLineelseDi2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("Tan of 90 degrees is {0}", result);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineConsole.WriteLine("Arc Tan of {0} is {1} degrees", double.PositiveInfinity, Math.Atan(double.PositiveInfinity) * 180 / Math.PI);Di2015NewLineConsole.WriteLine("Arc Tan of {0} is {1} degrees", result, Math.Atan(result) * 180 / Math.PI);Di2015NewLine

12111307Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic async Task DoWork()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  // By default, ActionBlock uses MaxDegreeOfParallelism == 1,Di2015NewLine  //  so AThreadUnsafeMethod is not called in parallel.Di2015NewLine  var block = new ActionBlock<Item>(AThreadUnsafeMethod);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // Start off N tasks, each asynchronously acquiring 10 items.Di2015NewLine  // Each item is sent to the block as it is received.Di2015NewLine  var tasks = Enumerable.Range(0, N).Select(Task.Run(Di2015NewLine      async () =>Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i != 10; ++i)Di2015NewLine          block.Post(await GetItemAsync());Di2015NewLine      })).ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // Complete the block when all tasks have completed.Di2015NewLine  Task.WhenAll(tasks).ContinueWith(_ => { block.Complete(); });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // Wait for the block to complete.Di2015NewLine  await block.Completion;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12112839Di2015UniqueSeparator    private string decipher(string ienc_text, string ipassword)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int iv_len = 16;Di2015NewLine        byte[] toEncryptArray = Convert.FromBase64String(ienc_text);Di2015NewLine        string encryptedString = Encoding.GetEncoding("iso-8859-1").GetString(toEncryptArray);Di2015NewLine        string password = ipassword;Di2015NewLine        int i = iv_len;Di2015NewLine        int n = encryptedString.Length;Di2015NewLine        string plain_text = "";Di2015NewLine        string iv = phpXOR(ipassword, encryptedString.Substring(0, iv_len));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        while (i < n)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string block = encryptedString.Substring(i, iv_len);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            string md5 = getMD5(iv);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            byte[] testPack = PackH(md5);Di2015NewLine            string testPackstring = Encoding.GetEncoding("iso-8859-1").GetString(testPack);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            string tmp = phpXOR(block, testPackstring);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            plain_text += tmp;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //string block_iv = block + iv;Di2015NewLine            //string tmp_iv = block_iv;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //if (block_iv.Length > 512)Di2015NewLine            //{Di2015NewLine            //    tmp_iv = block_iv.Substring(0, 512);Di2015NewLine            //}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //iv = phpXOR(tmp_iv, password);Di2015NewLine            //i += 16;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return plain_text;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static byte[] PackH(string hex)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if ((hex.Length % 2) == 1) hex += '0';Di2015NewLine        byte[] bytes = new byte[hex.Length / 2];Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < hex.Length; i += 2)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            bytes[i / 2] = Convert.ToByte(hex.Substring(i, 2), 16);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return bytes;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    string phpXOR(string text, string key)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        byte[] result = new byte[key.Length];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int c = 0; c < key.Length; c++)Di2015NewLine            result[c] = (byte)(((byte)text[c]) ^ ((byte)key[c]));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return Encoding.Default.GetString(result);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static string getMD5(string iValue)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        byte[] textBytes = System.Text.Encoding.Default.GetBytes(iValue);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            System.Security.Cryptography.MD5CryptoServiceProvider cryptHandler;Di2015NewLine            cryptHandler = new System.Security.Cryptography.MD5CryptoServiceProvider();Di2015NewLine            byte[] hash = cryptHandler.ComputeHash(textBytes);Di2015NewLine            string ret = "";Di2015NewLine            foreach (byte a in hash)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (a < 16)Di2015NewLine                    ret += "0" + a.ToString("x");Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                    ret += a.ToString("x");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return ret;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catchDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

12115408Di2015UniqueSeparatorvoid TuneQuotas()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (areQuotasBeingTuned)Di2015NewLine        return; //fast-path, does not require lockingDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    bool lockHeld = false;Di2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        try { }Di2015NewLine        finallyDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //finally-blocks cannot be aborted by Thread.AbortDi2015NewLine            //The thread could be aborted after getting the lock and before setting lockHeldDi2015NewLine            lockHeld = Monitor.TryEnter(tuningLock);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Don't bother if another thread already has the lockDi2015NewLine        if (!lockHeld || areQuotasBeingTuned)Di2015NewLine            return; //areQuotasBeingTuned could have switched to true in the mean-timeDi2015NewLine        areQuotasBeingTuned = true; //prevent others from needlessly trying to lock (trigger fast-path)Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    finally //ensure the lock being releasedDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (lockHeld)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Monitor.Exit(tuningLock);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    //Di2015NewLine    // DO WORK... (code removed for brevity)Di2015NewLine    //Di2015NewLine    //this might be a bug. There should be a call to Thread.MemoryBarrier,Di2015NewLine    //or areQuotasBeingTuned should be volatileDi2015NewLine    //if not, the write might never reach other processor coresDi2015NewLine    //maybe this doesn't matter for x86Di2015NewLine    areQuotasBeingTuned = false;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12116085Di2015UniqueSeparatorgrammar Inform6;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineoptions {Di2015NewLine  output=AST;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinetokens {Di2015NewLine  STATS;Di2015NewLine java.util.HashMap;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine@parser::members {Di2015NewLine  private Map<String, String> memory = new HashMap<String, String>(); Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  private void putInMemory(String key, String str) {Di2015NewLine    String value;Di2015NewLine    if(str.startsWith("\\"")) {Di2015NewLine      value = str.substring(1, str.length() - 1);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    else {Di2015NewLine      value = memory.get(str);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    memory.put(key, value);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  private void insertTokens(String fileName) {Di2015NewLine    // possibly strip quotes from `fileName` in case it's a Str-tokenDi2015NewLine    try {Di2015NewLine      CommonTokenStream thatStream = new CommonTokenStream(new Inform6Lexer(new ANTLRFileStream(fileName)));Di2015NewLine      thatStream.fill();Di2015NewLine      List extraTokens = thatStream.getTokens();Di2015NewLine      extraTokens.remove(extraTokens.size() - 1); // remove EOFDi2015NewLine      CommonTokenStream thisStream = (CommonTokenStream)this.getTokenStream();Di2015NewLine      thisStream.getTokens().addAll(thisStream.index(), extraTokens);Di2015NewLine    } catch(Exception e) {Di2015NewLine      e.printStackTrace();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineparseDi2015NewLine : stats EOF -> statsDi2015NewLine ;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatsDi2015NewLine : stat* -> ^(STATS stat*)Di2015NewLine ;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatDi2015NewLine : function_declDi2015NewLine | function_callDi2015NewLine | includeDi2015NewLine | constantDi2015NewLine | if_statDi2015NewLine ;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineif_statDi2015NewLine : If '(' expr ')' '{' stats '}' -> ^(If expr stats)Di2015NewLine ;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinefunction_declDi2015NewLine : '[' id ';' stats ']' ';' -> ^(F_DECL id stats)Di2015NewLine ;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinefunction_callDi2015NewLine : Id exprs ';' -> ^(F_CALL Id exprs)Di2015NewLine ;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineincludeDi2015NewLine : Include Str ';' {insertTokens($Str.text);}            -> /* omit statement from AST */Di2015NewLine | Include id ';'  {insertTokens(memory.get($id.text));} -> /* omit statement from AST */Di2015NewLine ;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineconstantDi2015NewLine : Constant id expr ';' {putInMemory($id.text, $expr.text);} -> ^(Constant id expr)Di2015NewLine ;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineexprsDi2015NewLine : expr (',' expr)* -> ^(EXPRS expr+)Di2015NewLine ;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineexprDi2015NewLine : add_exprDi2015NewLine ;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineadd_exprDi2015NewLine : mult_expr (('+' | '-')^ mult_expr)*Di2015NewLine ;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinemult_exprDi2015NewLine : atom (('*' | '/')^ atom)*Di2015NewLine ;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineatomDi2015NewLine : idDi2015NewLine | NumDi2015NewLine | StrDi2015NewLine | '(' expr ')' -> exprDi2015NewLine ;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineidDi2015NewLine : IdDi2015NewLine | IncludeDi2015NewLine ;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineComment  : '!' ~('\\r' | '\\n')* {skip();};Di2015NewLineSpace    : (' ' | '\\t' | '\\r' | '\\n')+ {skip();};Di2015NewLineIf       : 'if';Di2015NewLineInclude  : 'Include';Di2015NewLineConstant : 'Constant';Di2015NewLineId       : ('a'..'z' | 'A'..'Z') ('a'..'z' | 'A'..'Z' | '0'..'9')+;Di2015NewLineStr      : '"' ~'"'* '"';Di2015NewLineNum      : '0'..'9'+ ('.' 12122082Di2015UniqueSeparator// Specify the size according to your need.Di2015NewLineprivate byte[] bytData = new byte[1024 * 50000];Di2015NewLineprivate Socket oServerSocket;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void WindowLoaded(object sender, RoutedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // We are using TCP socketsDi2015NewLine        this.oServerSocket = new Socket(Di2015NewLine        addressFamily: AddressFamily.InterNetwork,Di2015NewLine        socketType: SocketType.Stream,Di2015NewLine        protocolType: ProtocolType.Tcp);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Assign the any IP of the hardware and listen on port number which the hardware is sending(here it's 5656)Di2015NewLine        var oIPEndPoint = new IPEndPoint(address: IPAddress.Any, port: 5656);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Bind and listen on the given addressDi2015NewLine        this.oServerSocket.Bind(localEP: oIPEndPoint);Di2015NewLine        this.oServerSocket.Listen(backlog: 4);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Accept the incoming clientsDi2015NewLine        this.oServerSocket.BeginAccept(this.OnAccept, null);Di2015NewLine        this.oLogger.WriteLog("Server started");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Handle ExceptionDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
12122082Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void OnAccept(IAsyncResult ar)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var oClientSocket = this.oServerSocket.EndAccept(asyncResult: ar);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Start listening for more clientsDi2015NewLine        this.oServerSocket.BeginAccept(callback: this.OnAccept, state: null);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Once the client connects then start receiving the commands from herDi2015NewLine        oClientSocket.BeginReceive(Di2015NewLine        buffer: this.bytData,Di2015NewLine        offset: 0,Di2015NewLine        size: this.bytData.Length,Di2015NewLine        socketFlags: SocketFlags.None,Di2015NewLine        callback: this.OnReceive,Di2015NewLine        state: oClientSocket);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Handle ExceptionDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
12122082Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void OnReceive(IAsyncResult ar)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var oClientSocket = (Socket)ar.AsyncState;Di2015NewLine        oClientSocket.EndReceive(asyncResult: ar);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /* Process the data hereDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        BitConverter.ToInt32(value: this.bytData, startIndex: 0);Di2015NewLine        string SomeString= Encoding.ASCII.GetString(bytes: this.bytData, index: 8, count: 5);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        */Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Specify the size according to your need.Di2015NewLine        this.bytData = null;Di2015NewLine        this.bytData = new byte[1024 * 50000];Di2015NewLine        oClientSocket.BeginReceive(Di2015NewLine            buffer: this.bytData,Di2015NewLine            offset: 0,Di2015NewLine            size: this.bytData.Length,Di2015NewLine            socketFlags: SocketFlags.None,Di2015NewLine            callback: this.OnReceive,Di2015NewLine            state: oClientSocket);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Handle ExceptionDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12122332Di2015UniqueSeparator    private string ReadFile(string filePath)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //this verse is loaded for the first time so fill it from the text fileDi2015NewLine        var ResrouceStream = Application.GetResourceStream(new Uri(filePath, UriKind.Relative));Di2015NewLine        if (ResrouceStream != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Stream myFileStream = ResrouceStream.Stream;Di2015NewLine            if (myFileStream.CanRead)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                StreamReader myStreamReader = new StreamReader(myFileStream);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //read the content hereDi2015NewLine                return myStreamReader.ReadToEnd();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return "NULL";Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

12122899Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static Quaternion ToQ (Vector3 v)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return ToQ (v.y, v.x, v.z);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static Quaternion ToQ (float yaw, float pitch, float roll)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    yaw *= Mathf.Deg2Rad;Di2015NewLine    pitch *= Mathf.Deg2Rad;Di2015NewLine    roll *= Mathf.Deg2Rad;Di2015NewLine    float rollOver2 = roll * 0.5f;Di2015NewLine    float sinRollOver2 = (float)Math.Sin ((double)rollOver2);Di2015NewLine    float cosRollOver2 = (float)Math.Cos ((double)rollOver2);Di2015NewLine    float pitchOver2 = pitch * 0.5f;Di2015NewLine    float sinPitchOver2 = (float)Math.Sin ((double)pitchOver2);Di2015NewLine    float cosPitchOver2 = (float)Math.Cos ((double)pitchOver2);Di2015NewLine    float yawOver2 = yaw * 0.5f;Di2015NewLine    float sinYawOver2 = (float)Math.Sin ((double)yawOver2);Di2015NewLine    float cosYawOver2 = (float)Math.Cos ((double)yawOver2);Di2015NewLine    Quaternion result;Di2015NewLine    result.w = cosYawOver2 * cosPitchOver2 * cosRollOver2 + sinYawOver2 * sinPitchOver2 * sinRollOver2;Di2015NewLine    result.x = cosYawOver2 * sinPitchOver2 * cosRollOver2 + sinYawOver2 * cosPitchOver2 * sinRollOver2;Di2015NewLine    result.y = sinYawOver2 * cosPitchOver2 * cosRollOver2 - cosYawOver2 * sinPitchOver2 * sinRollOver2;Di2015NewLine    result.z = cosYawOver2 * cosPitchOver2 * sinRollOver2 - sinYawOver2 * sinPitchOver2 * cosRollOver2;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static Vector3 FromQ2 (Quaternion q1)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    float sqw = q1.w * q1.w;Di2015NewLine    float sqx = q1.x * q1.x;Di2015NewLine    float sqy = q1.y * q1.y;Di2015NewLine    float sqz = q1.z * q1.z;Di2015NewLine    float unit = sqx + sqy + sqz + sqw; // if normalised is one, otherwise is correction factorDi2015NewLine    float test = q1.x * q1.w - q1.y * q1.z;Di2015NewLine    Vector3 v;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (test>0.4995f*unit) { // singularity at north poleDi2015NewLine        v.y = 2f * Mathf.Atan2 (q1.y, q1.x);Di2015NewLine        v.x = Mathf.PI / 2;Di2015NewLine        v.z = 0;Di2015NewLine        return NormalizeAngles (v * Mathf.Rad2Deg);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (test<-0.4995f*unit) { // singularity at south poleDi2015NewLine        v.y = -2f * Mathf.Atan2 (q1.y, q1.x);Di2015NewLine        v.x = -Mathf.PI / 2;Di2015NewLine        v.z = 0;Di2015NewLine        return NormalizeAngles (v * Mathf.Rad2Deg);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    Quaternion q = new Quaternion (q1.w, q1.z, q1.x, q1.y);Di2015NewLine    v.y = (float)Math.Atan2 (2f * q.x * q.w + 2f * q.y * q.z, 1 - 2f * (q.z * q.z + q.w * q.w));     // YawDi2015NewLine    v.x = (float)Math.Asin (2f * (q.x * q.z - q.w * q.y));                             // PitchDi2015NewLine    v.z = (float)Math.Atan2 (2f * q.x * q.y + 2f * q.z * q.w, 1 - 2f * (q.y * q.y + q.z * q.z));      // RollDi2015NewLine    return NormalizeAngles (v * Mathf.Rad2Deg);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic Vector3 NormalizeAngles (Vector3 angles)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    angles.x = NormalizeAngle (angles.x);Di2015NewLine    angles.y = NormalizeAngle (angles.y);Di2015NewLine    angles.z = NormalizeAngle (angles.z);Di2015NewLine    return angles;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic float NormalizeAngle (float angle)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    while (angle>360)Di2015NewLine        angle -= 360;Di2015NewLine    while (angle<0)Di2015NewLine        angle += 360;Di2015NewLine    return angle;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12123137Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static IEnumerable<Coordinate> ProduceRandomCoordinates(int num)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  var rnd = new Random();Di2015NewLine  while(num-- > 0)Di2015NewLine    yield return new Coordinate{X=rnd.Next(-100, 101), Y=rnd.Next(-100, 101)};Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineusing(var db = new OurDataContext(connString))Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  var tab = db.Coordinates;Di2015NewLine  tab.InsertAllOnSubmit(ProduceRandomCoordinates(500));Di2015NewLine  db.SubmitChanges();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12123185Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar bm = new Bitmap...Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//lock all image bitsDi2015NewLinevar bitmapData = bm.LockBits(new Rectangle(0, 0, bm.Width, bm.Height), ImageLockMode.ReadWrite, PixelFormat.Format1bppIndexed);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// this  will return the pixel index in the color palleteDi2015NewLine// since is 1bpp it will return 0 or 1Di2015NewLineint pixelColorIndex = GetIndexedPixel(50, 30, bitmapData);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// read the color from palleteDi2015NewLineColor pixelColor = bm.Pallete.Entries[pixelColorIndex];Di2015NewLine
12123185Di2015UniqueSeparator// x, y relative to the locked areaDi2015NewLineprivate int GetIndexedPixel(int x, int y, BitmapData bitmapData)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var index = y * bitmapData.Stride + (x >> 3);Di2015NewLine    var chunk = Marshal.ReadByte(bitmapData.Scan0, index);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var mask = (byte)(0x80 >> (x & 0x7));Di2015NewLine    return (chunk & mask) == mask ? 1 : 0;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
12123185Di2015UniqueSeparatorx & 0x7
12123185Di2015UniqueSeparatorx = 58 Di2015NewLine// x / 8 - the pixel is on byte 7Di2015NewLinebyte = 58 >> 3 = 58 / 8 = 7 Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// x % 8 - byte 7, bit 2Di2015NewLinebitPosition = 58 & 0x7 = 2 Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// the pixels are read from left to right, so we start with 0x80 and then shift right. Di2015NewLinemask = 0x80 >> bitPosition = 1000 0000b >> 2 =  0010 0000b Di2015NewLine

}Di2015NewLine                    catch (Exception)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        // Let the user know what went wrong.Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (Exception)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine targetPath = @"C:\\Test";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            string sourceFile = System.IO.Path.Combine(sourcePath, filename);Di2015NewLine            string destFile = 12131128Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic Image byteArrayToImage(byte[] byteArrayIn)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    MemoryStream ms = new MemoryStream(byteArrayIn);Di2015NewLine    Image returnImage = Image.FromStream(ms);Di2015NewLine    return returnImage;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
12131128Di2015UniqueSeparator  private byte[] ImageToByteArray(string ImageFile)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        FileStream stream = new FileStream(Di2015NewLine              ImageFile, FileMode.Open, FileAccess.Read);Di2015NewLine        BinaryReader reader = new BinaryReader(stream);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Convert image to byte array.Di2015NewLine        byte[] photo = reader.ReadBytes((int)stream.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return photo;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
12131183Di2015UniqueSeparatorN
12131183Di2015UniqueSeparatorL
12131183Di2015UniqueSeparatorF(T)
12131183Di2015UniqueSeparator(T, N)
12131183Di2015UniqueSeparatorF(T) = F(T + 1)
12131183Di2015UniqueSeparatorT
12131183Di2015UniqueSeparatorT
12131183Di2015UniqueSeparatorT + L
12131183Di2015UniqueSeparatorF(T) = max(F(T + 1), F(T + L) + 1)
12131183Di2015UniqueSeparatorF(N) = 0
12131183Di2015UniqueSeparatorF(N)
12131183Di2015UniqueSeparatorF(0)
12131183Di2015UniqueSeparatorN = 11
12131183Di2015UniqueSeparatorL = 2
12131183Di2015UniqueSeparatorT = 0, 3, 4, 5, 6, 9
12131183Di2015UniqueSeparatorF(11) = 0
12131183Di2015UniqueSeparatorF(11) = 0
12131183Di2015UniqueSeparatorF(10) = F(11) = 0
12131183Di2015UniqueSeparatorT = 10
12131183Di2015UniqueSeparatorF(9) = max(F(10), F(11) + 1) = 1
12131183Di2015UniqueSeparatorF(0) = 4
12131183Di2015UniqueSeparatorT   |00|01|02|03|04|05|06|07|08|09|10|Di2015NewLineF(T)| 4| 3| 3| 3| 3| 2| 2| 1| 1| 1| 0|Di2015NewLine
12131183Di2015UniqueSeparator(0, 2) -> (4, 6) -> (6, 8) -> (9, 11)
12131183Di2015UniqueSeparator(0, 2) -> (4, 6) -> (8, 10)
12131183Di2015UniqueSeparator    public override string ToString()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return string.Format("({0:d}, {1:d})", Start, End);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate class CacheEntry : IComparableDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public int Tasks { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public int Gaps { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public int MinGap { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public Task Task { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public Task NextTask { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int CompareTo(object obj)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var other = obj as CacheEntry;Di2015NewLine        if (Tasks != other.Tasks)Di2015NewLine            return Tasks - other.Tasks; // More tasks is betterDi2015NewLine        if (Gaps != other.Gaps)Di2015NewLine            return other.Gaps = Gaps; // Less gaps is betterDi2015NewLine        return MinGap - other.MinGap; // Larger minimum gap is betterDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static IList<Task> F(IList<Task> tasks)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var end = tasks.Max(x => x.End);Di2015NewLine    var tasksByTime = tasks.ToLookup(x => x.Start);Di2015NewLine    var cache = new List<CacheEntry>[end + 1];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    cache[end] = new List<CacheEntry> { new CacheEntry { Tasks = 0, Gaps = 0, MinGap = end + 1 } };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int t = end - 1; t >= 0; t--)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!tasksByTime.Contains(t))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            cache[t] = cache[t + 1];Di2015NewLine            continue;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (var task in tasksByTime[t])Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var oldCEs = cache[t + task.Length];Di2015NewLine            var firstOldCE = oldCEs.First();Di2015NewLine            var lastOldCE = oldCEs.Last();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var newCE = new CacheEntryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Tasks = firstOldCE.Tasks + 1,Di2015NewLine                Task = task,Di2015NewLine                Gaps = firstOldCE.Gaps,Di2015NewLine                MinGap = firstOldCE.MinGapDi2015NewLine            };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // If there is a task that starts at time T + L, then that will always Di2015NewLine            // be the best option for us, as it will have one less Gap than the othersDi2015NewLine            if (firstOldCE.Task == null || firstOldCE.Task.Start == task.End)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                newCE.NextTask = firstOldCE.Task;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            // Otherwise we want the one that maximises MinGap.Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var ce = oldCEs.OrderBy(x => Math.Min(x.Task.Start - newCE.Task.End, x.MinGap)).Last();Di2015NewLine                newCE.NextTask = ce.Task;Di2015NewLine                newCE.Gaps++;Di2015NewLine                newCE.MinGap = Math.Min(ce.MinGap, ce.Task.Start - task.End);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var toComp = cache[t] ?? cache[t + 1];Di2015NewLine            if (newCE.CompareTo(toComp.First()) < 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                cache[t] = toComp;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var ceList = new List<CacheEntry> { newCE };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // We need to keep track of all subsolutions X that start on the interval [T, T+L] thatDi2015NewLine                // have an equal number of tasks and gaps, but a possibly a smaller MinGap. This isDi2015NewLine                // because an earlier task may have an even smaller gap to this task.Di2015NewLine                int idx = newCE.Task.Start + 1;Di2015NewLine                while (idx < newCE.Task.End)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    toComp = cache[idx];Di2015NewLine                    ifDi2015NewLine                    (Di2015NewLine                        newCE.Tasks == toComp.First().Tasks &&Di2015NewLine                        newCE.Gaps == toComp.First().Gaps &&Di2015NewLine                        newCE.MinGap >= toComp.First().MinGapDi2015NewLine                    )Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        ceList.AddRange(toComp);Di2015NewLine                        idx += toComp.First().Task.End;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    elseDi2015NewLine                        idx++;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                cache[t] = ceList;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var rv = new List<Task>();Di2015NewLine    var curr = cache[0].First();Di2015NewLine    while (true)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        rv.Add(curr.Task);Di2015NewLine        if (curr.NextTask == null) break;Di2015NewLine        curr = cache[curr.NextTask.Start].First();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return rv;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static void Main()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    IList<Task> tasks, sol;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    tasks = new List<Task>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        new Task { Start = 0, Length = 2 },Di2015NewLine        new Task { Start = 3, Length = 2 },Di2015NewLine        new Task { Start = 4, Length = 2 },Di2015NewLine        new Task { Start = 5, Length = 2 },Di2015NewLine        new Task { Start = 6, Length = 2 },Di2015NewLine        new Task { Start = 9, Length = 2 },Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    sol = F(tasks);Di2015NewLine    foreach (var task in sol)Di2015NewLine        Console.Out.WriteLine(task);Di2015NewLine    Console.Out.WriteLine();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    tasks = new List<Task>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        new Task { Start = 0, Length = 2 },Di2015NewLine        new Task { Start = 3, Length = 2 },Di2015NewLine        new Task { Start = 4, Length = 2 },Di2015NewLine        new Task { Start = 8, Length = 2 },Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    sol = F(tasks);Di2015NewLine    foreach (var task in sol)Di2015NewLine        Console.Out.WriteLine(task);Di2015NewLine    Console.Out.WriteLine();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    tasks = new List<Task>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        new Task { Start = 0, Length = 5 },Di2015NewLine        new Task { Start = 6, Length = 5 },Di2015NewLine        new Task { Start = 7, Length = 3 },Di2015NewLine        new Task { Start = 8, Length = 9 },Di2015NewLine        new Task { Start = 19, Length = 1 },Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    sol = F(tasks);Di2015NewLine    foreach (var task in sol)Di2015NewLine        Console.Out.WriteLine(task);Di2015NewLine    Console.Out.WriteLine();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Console.In.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
12131356Di2015UniqueSeparatorSELECT Di2015NewLine    g.godown_name, Di2015NewLine    s.supplier_name, Di2015NewLine    t.type_name,Di2015NewLine    b.lb_per_bag, Di2015NewLine    SUM(r.bags_instock) As total_bags_instock, Di2015NewLine    SUM(t.rate * r.bags_instock) Di2015NewLine        /SUM(r.bags_instock) As average_rateDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineFROM tbl_godown_transaction  As gtDi2015NewLineJOIN tbl_godown          As g  ON gt.godown_id   = g.godown_id Di2015NewLineJOIN tbl_yarn_receive    As r  ON gt.receive_id  = r.receive_idDi2015NewLineJOIN tbl_yarn_book       As b  ON r.book_id      = b.book_id Di2015NewLineJOIN tbl_yarn_supplier   As s  ON s.supplier_id  = b.supplier_id Di2015NewLineJOIN tbl_yarn_type       As t  ON t.type_id      = b.type_idDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineGROUP BYDi2015NewLine    g.godown_name, Di2015NewLine    s.supplier_name, Di2015NewLine    t.type_name,Di2015NewLine    r.lb_per_bagDi2015NewLine

12131609Di2015UniqueSeparatorCREATE PROC dbo.GetNextBatchOfEmailsDi2015NewLineASDi2015NewLine    BEGINDi2015NewLine        -- Identify the next N emails to be batched. UPDLOCK is to prevent another thread batching same emailsDi2015NewLine        SELECT top 100 EmailId Di2015NewLine        INTO #tmpBatchDi2015NewLine            FROM dbo.Emails WITH (UPDLOCK)Di2015NewLine            WHERE IsProcessed = 0Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        -- Stamp emails as sent. Assumed that PROC is called under a UOW. The batch IS the UOWDi2015NewLine        UPDATE eDi2015NewLine            SET e.IsProcessed = 1Di2015NewLine            FROM dbo.Emails eDi2015NewLine            INNER JOIN #tmpBatch tDi2015NewLine                on e.EmailId = t.EmailIdDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        -- Return the batch of emails to callerDi2015NewLine        SELECT e.*Di2015NewLine            FROM dbo.Emails eDi2015NewLine            INNER JOIN #tmpBatch tDi2015NewLine                on e.EmailId = t.EmailIdDi2015NewLine    ENDDi2015NewLine

12141750Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static TextPointer GetTextPointAt(TextPointer from, int pos)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine        TextPointer ret = from;Di2015NewLine        int i = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        while ((i < pos) && (ret != null))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if ((ret.GetPointerContext(LogicalDirection.Backward) == TextPointerContext.Text) || (ret.GetPointerContext(LogicalDirection.Backward) == TextPointerContext.None))Di2015NewLine                i++;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (ret.GetPositionAtOffset(1, LogicalDirection.Forward) == null)Di2015NewLine                return ret;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            ret = ret.GetPositionAtOffset(1, LogicalDirection.Forward);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return ret;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineinternal string Select(RichTextBox rtb, int offset, int length, Color color)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine        // Get text selection:Di2015NewLine        TextSelection textRange = rtb.Selection;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Get text starting point:Di2015NewLine        TextPointer start = rtb.Document.ContentStart;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Get begin and end requested:Di2015NewLine        TextPointer startPos = GetTextPointAt(start, offset);Di2015NewLine        TextPointer endPos = GetTextPointAt(start, offset + length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // New selection of text:Di2015NewLine        textRange.Select(startPos, endPos);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Apply property to the selection:Di2015NewLine        textRange.ApplyPropertyValue(TextElement.BackgroundProperty, new SolidColorBrush(color));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Return selection text:Di2015NewLine        return rtb.Selection.Text;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
