12149938Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void EnableAllButtons() Di2015NewLine{ Di2015NewLine    //See if the main form needs invoke required, assuming the buttons are on the same thread as the formDi2015NewLine    if(this.InvokeRequired) Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //Calls EnableAllButtons a seccond time but this time on the main thread.Di2015NewLine        //This does not block, it is "fire and forget"Di2015NewLine        this.BeginInvoke(new Action(EnableAllButtons));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        btnProcessImages.Enabled = true; Di2015NewLine        btnBrowse.Enabled = true; Di2015NewLine        btnUpload.Enabled = true; Di2015NewLine        btnExit.Enabled = true; Di2015NewLine        ControlBox = true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
12149938Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void processWorker1_DoWork(object sender, DoWorkEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine     string code = DoLongWorkAndReturnCode();Di2015NewLine     e.Result = code;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineprivate void processWorkers_RunWorkerCompleted(object sender, RunWorkerCompletedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (code != 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        MessageBox.Show("Error!");Di2015NewLine        EnableAllButtons(); // this is defined in the other thread and it's where i run into the error.Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine          doAnotherLongProcessAndReturnCodesBackgroundWorker.RunWorkerAsync(); Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
12149938Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void processWorker1_DoWork(object sender, DoWorkEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine     string code = DoLongWorkAndReturnCode();Di2015NewLine     if (code != 0)Di2015NewLine     {Di2015NewLine         thow new MyCustomExecption(code);Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void processWorker2_DoWork(object sender, DoWorkEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine     string code = DoAnotherLongProcessAndReturnCode(); Di2015NewLine     if (code != 0)Di2015NewLine     {Di2015NewLine         thow new MyCustomExecption(code);Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void processWorkers_RunWorkerCompleted(object sender, RunWorkerCompletedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if(e.Error != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string message;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //See if it was our errorDi2015NewLine        if(e.Error.GetType() == typeOf(MyCustomExecption))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Choose which error message to sendDi2015NewLine            if(sender.Equals(processWorker2))Di2015NewLine                message = "Error2!";Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine                message = "Error!";Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //Handle other types of thrown exceptions other than the ones we sentDi2015NewLine            message = e.Error.ToString();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //no matter what, show a dialog box and enable all buttons.Di2015NewLine        MessageBox.Show(message);Di2015NewLine        EnableAllButtons();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //Worker completed successfully. Di2015NewLine        //If this was called from processWorker1 call processWorker2Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Here is the code that was returned from the functionDi2015NewLine        if(sender.Equals(processWorker1))Di2015NewLine            processWorker2.RunWorkerAsync();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12151374Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void dataGridViewLifeSchedule_CellPainting(object sender, DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs e) {Di2015NewLine    // 1. This is used to replace what is StringFormat.GenericDefault in the msdn code with strFormatDi2015NewLine    StringFormat strFormat = new StringFormat();Di2015NewLine    strFormat.Trimming = StringTrimming.None; Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Rectangle newRect = new Rectangle(e.CellBounds.X + 1,Di2015NewLine    e.CellBounds.Y + 1, e.CellBounds.Width - 4,Di2015NewLine    e.CellBounds.Height - 4);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    using (Di2015NewLine        Brush gridBrush = new SolidBrush(this.dataGridViewLifeSchedule.GridColor),Di2015NewLine        backColorBrush = new SolidBrush(e.CellStyle.BackColor)) {Di2015NewLine        using (Pen gridLinePen = new Pen(gridBrush)) {Di2015NewLine            // Erase the cell.Di2015NewLine            e.Graphics.FillRectangle(backColorBrush, e.CellBounds);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Draw the grid lines (only the right and bottom lines; Di2015NewLine            // DataGridView takes care of the others).Di2015NewLine            e.Graphics.DrawLine(gridLinePen, e.CellBounds.Left,Di2015NewLine                e.CellBounds.Bottom - 1, e.CellBounds.Right - 1,Di2015NewLine                e.CellBounds.Bottom - 1);Di2015NewLine            e.Graphics.DrawLine(gridLinePen, e.CellBounds.Right - 1,Di2015NewLine                e.CellBounds.Top, e.CellBounds.Right - 1,Di2015NewLine                e.CellBounds.Bottom);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Draw the inset highlight box.Di2015NewLine            e.Graphics.DrawRectangle(Pens.BlanchedAlmond, newRect); // 2. It is Pens.Blue in the msdn codeDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Draw the text content of the cell, ignoring alignment. Di2015NewLine            if (e.Value != null) {Di2015NewLine                e.Graphics.DrawString((String)e.Value, e.CellStyle.Font,Di2015NewLine                    Brushes.Black, e.CellBounds.X + 2, // 3. It is Brushes.Crimson in the msdn codeDi2015NewLine                    e.CellBounds.Y + 2, strFormat);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            e.Handled = true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
12151470Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineusing Excel = Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace ExcelFun01Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Excel.Application xlApp = new Excel.Application();Di2015NewLine            Excel.Workbook xlWb = xlApp.Workbooks.Open(@"C:\\stackoverflow.xlsx");Di2015NewLine            Excel.Worksheet xlWs = (Excel.Worksheet)xlWb.Sheets[1]; // Sheet1Di2015NewLine            Excel.Worksheet xlWsNew = (Excel.Worksheet)xlWb.Sheets.Add();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // find the data rangeDi2015NewLine            Excel.Range dataRange = getDataRange(ref xlWs);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // start by creating the PivotCache - this tells Excel that there is a data connectionDi2015NewLine            // to data inside the workbook (could be used to get external data, too)Di2015NewLine            Excel.PivotCache pc = xlWb.PivotCaches().Create(Excel.XlPivotTableSourceType.xlDatabaseDi2015NewLine                                                            ,dataRangeDi2015NewLine                                                            ,Excel.XlPivotTableVersionList.xlPivotTableVersion14);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // create the pivot table and set the destination to the new sheet at A1Di2015NewLine            Excel.PivotTable pt = pc.CreatePivotTable(xlWsNew.Range["A1"]);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // get the PivotField "Same" for easy referencingDi2015NewLine            Excel.PivotField pf = (Excel.PivotField)pt.PivotFields("Same");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // first add the countDi2015NewLine            pt.AddDataField(pf, "Count of Same", Excel.XlConsolidationFunction.xlCount);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // now add the row with the same fieldDi2015NewLine            pf.Orientation = Excel.XlPivotFieldOrientation.xlRowField;Di2015NewLine            pf.Position = 1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // behold!!!Di2015NewLine            xlWsNew.Select();Di2015NewLine            xlApp.Visible = true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static Excel.Range getDataRange(ref Excel.Worksheet xlWs)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Excel.Range rng = xlWs.Cells.SpecialCells(Excel.XlCellType.xlCellTypeLastCell);Di2015NewLine            Excel.Range dataRange = xlWs.Range["A1", rng.Address];Di2015NewLine            return dataRange;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12157476Di2015UniqueSeparatorprotected void Page_Load(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  List<People> pplList = LoadPeople();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  foreach (People person in pplList.OrderBy(pp => pp.ManagerID))Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    IEnumerable<TreeNode> nodes = Extensions.GetItems<TreeNode>(TreeViewPeople.Nodes, item => item.ChildNodes);Di2015NewLine    TreeNode parent = nodes.FirstOrDefault(nn => nn.Value.Equals(person.ManagerID.ToString()));         Di2015NewLine    TreeNode newNode = new TreeNode(person.Name, person.ID.ToString());Di2015NewLine    if (parent == null)Di2015NewLine      TreeViewPeople.Nodes.Add(newNode);Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine      parent.ChildNodes.Add(newNode);          Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
12157476Di2015UniqueSeparator  public static class ExtensionsDi2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    public static IEnumerable<T> GetItems<T>(this IEnumerable collection, Func<T, IEnumerable> selector)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      Stack<IEnumerable<T>> stack = new Stack<IEnumerable<T>>();Di2015NewLine      stack.Push(collection.OfType<T>());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      while (stack.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        IEnumerable<T> items = stack.Pop();Di2015NewLine        foreach (var item in items)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine          yield return item;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine          IEnumerable<T> children = selector(item).OfType<T>();Di2015NewLine          stack.Push(children);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine

12162159Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class NodeDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public string Name;Di2015NewLine    public string Address;Di2015NewLine    public int Id;Di2015NewLine    public List<Node> Children;Di2015NewLine    public Node Parent;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Node()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.Children = new List<Node>();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public string CompareIdDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        getDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var temp = string.Concat(this.Name, this.Address, this.Id);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (this.Parent == null)Di2015NewLine                return temp;Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine                return string.Concat(temp, this.Parent.CompareId);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override bool Equals(object OtherNode)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (OtherNode is Node)Di2015NewLine            return this.CompareId.Equals(((Node)OtherNode).CompareId);Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static Node RemoveDuplicatesFromTree(Node RootNode)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (RootNode.Children.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            List<Node> OldChildrenList = new List<Node>();Di2015NewLine            OldChildrenList.AddRange(RootNode.Children);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (Node CurrentChild in OldChildrenList)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (RootNode.Children.Any<Node>(x => x.Equals(CurrentChild)))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    List<Node> Duplicates = RootNode.Children.Where(x => x.Equals(CurrentChild)).ToList<Node>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    Duplicates.ForEach(x =>Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            CurrentChild.Children = CurrentChild.Children.Union<Node>(x.Children).ToList<Node>();Di2015NewLine                            RootNode.Children.Remove(x);Di2015NewLine                        });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    RootNode.Children.Add(CurrentChild);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                Node.RemoveDuplicatesFromTree(CurrentChild);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return RootNode;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12165277Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class UploadController : ApiControllerDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public async Task<HttpResponseMessage> Post()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!Request.Content.IsMimeMultipartContent())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new HttpResponseException(HttpStatusCode.UnsupportedMediaType);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var appData = HostingEnvironment.MapPath("~/App_Data");Di2015NewLine        var folder = Path.Combine(appData, Guid.NewGuid().ToString());Di2015NewLine        Directory.CreateDirectory(folder);Di2015NewLine        var provider = new MultipartFormDataStreamProvider(folder);Di2015NewLine        var result = await Request.Content.ReadAsMultipartAsync(provider);Di2015NewLine        if (result.FileData.Count < 1)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // no files were uploaded at allDi2015NewLine            // TODO: here you could return an error message to the client if you wantDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // at this stage all files that were uploaded by the user will beDi2015NewLine        // stored inside the folder we specified without us needing to doDi2015NewLine        // any additional stepsDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // we can now read some additional FormDataDi2015NewLine        string caption = result.FormData["caption"];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // TODO: update your database with the other data that was postedDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return Request.CreateResponse(HttpStatusCode.OK, "thanks for uploading");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

SortDirection.Ascending : SortDirection.Descending;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return (SortDirection)ViewState[sortExpression];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12169518Di2015UniqueSeparator// This comes straight from Wikipedia article linked above:Di2015NewLineprivate static string FindLcs(string s, string t) {Di2015NewLine    var L = new int[s.Length, t.Length];Di2015NewLine    var z = 0;Di2015NewLine    var ret = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine    for (var i = 0 ; i != s.Length ; i++) {Di2015NewLine        for (var j = 0 ; j != t.Length ; j++) {Di2015NewLine            if (s[i] == t[j]) {Di2015NewLine                if (i == 0 || j == 0) {Di2015NewLine                    L[i,j] = 1;Di2015NewLine                } else {Di2015NewLine                    L[i,j] = L[i-1,j-1] + 1;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                if (L[i,j] > z) {Di2015NewLine                    z = L[i,j];Di2015NewLine                    ret = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                if (L[i,j] == z) {Di2015NewLine                    ret.Append(s.Substring( i-z+1, z));Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            } else {Di2015NewLine                L[i,j]=0;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return ret.ToString();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine// With the LCS in hand, building the answer is easyDi2015NewLinepublic static string CutLcs(string s, string t) {Di2015NewLine    for (;;) {Di2015NewLine        var lcs = FindLcs(s, t);Di2015NewLine        if (lcs.Length < 10) break;Di2015NewLine        s = s.Replace(lcs, string.Format("[{0}]", lcs.Length));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return s;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
12169542Di2015UniqueSeparator     static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string backupPath = @"C:\\Backup\\";Di2015NewLine        string[] folders = Directory.GetDirectories(backupPath);Di2015NewLine        Int16 max = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (var item in folders)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //int lastPartOfFolderName;Di2015NewLine            int lastDotPosition = item.LastIndexOf('.');Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (lastDotPosition > -1 && !item.EndsWith("."))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Int16 folderNumber;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (Int16.TryParse(item.Substring(lastDotPosition + 1), out folderNumber))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (folderNumber > max)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        max = folderNumber;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        max++;Di2015NewLine        Directory.CreateDirectory(@"C:\\Backup\\Data." + max);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

12170178Di2015UniqueSeparatorvoid InsertACharacterNoStringAfterEveryNCharactersInAHugeTextFileUsingCSharp(Di2015NewLine    string inputPath, string outputPath, int blockSize, string separator)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    using (var input = File.OpenText(inputPath))Di2015NewLine    using (var output = File.CreateText(outputPath))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var buffer = new char[blockSize];Di2015NewLine        int readCount;Di2015NewLine        while ((readCount = input.ReadBlock(buffer, 0, buffer.Length)) > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            output.Write(buffer, 0, readCount);Di2015NewLine            if (readCount == buffer.Length)Di2015NewLine                output.Write(separator);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// usage:Di2015NewLineInsertACharacterNoStringAfterEveryNCharactersInAHugeTextFileUsingCSharp(Di2015NewLine    inputPath, outputPath, 3, Environment.NewLine);Di2015NewLine

12173565Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static bool CompareCharBuffers(Di2015NewLine    char[] buffer,Di2015NewLine    int headPosition,Di2015NewLine    char[] stringChars)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // null checking and length comparison ommittedDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var same = true;Di2015NewLine    var bufferPos = headPosition;Di2015NewLine    for (var i = 0; i < stringChars.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!stringChars[i].Equals(buffer[bufferPos]))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            same = false;Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        bufferPos = ++bufferPos % (buffer.Length - 1);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return same;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
12173565Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar stringChars = searchString.ToCharArray();Di2015NewLinevar found = false;Di2015NewLinestring file;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineforeach (file in Directory.EnumerateFiles(Di2015NewLine            "d:\\\\tes\\\\",Di2015NewLine            "*.txt",Di2015NewLine            SearchOption.AllDirectories))Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    using (var reader = File.OpenText(file))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var buffer = new char[stringChars.Length];Di2015NewLine        if (reader.ReadBlock(buffer, 0, buffer.Length - 1) Di2015NewLine                < stringChars.Length - 1)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            continue;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var head = 0;Di2015NewLine        var nextPos = buffer.Length - 1;Di2015NewLine        var nextChar = reader.Read();Di2015NewLine        while (nextChar != -1)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            buffer[nextPos] = (char)nextChar;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (CompareCharBuffers(buffer, head, stringChars))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine               found = ture;Di2015NewLine               break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            head = ++head % (buffer.Length - 1);Di2015NewLine            if (head == 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                nextPos = buffer.Length - 1;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                nextPos = head - 1;Di2015NewLine            } Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            nextChar = reader.Read();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (found)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineif (found)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var message = string.Format("Search string found in \\"{0}\\".", file)Di2015NewLine    MessageBox.Show(file);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12174282Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine///  Regular expression built for C# on: Wed, Aug 29, 2012, 09:56:25 AMDi2015NewLine///  Using Expresso Version: 3.0.4334, http://www.ultrapico.comDi2015NewLine///  Di2015NewLine///  A description of the regular expression:Di2015NewLine///  Di2015NewLine///  [1]: A numbered capture group. [(?<counter>").*?(?<-counter>").*?(?(counter)(?!))]Di2015NewLine///      (?<counter>").*?(?<-counter>").*?(?(counter)(?!))Di2015NewLine///          [counter]: A named capture group. ["]Di2015NewLine///              "Di2015NewLine///          Any character, any number of repetitions, as few as possibleDi2015NewLine///          Balancing group. Remove the most recent [counter] capture from the stack. ["]Di2015NewLine///              "Di2015NewLine///          Any character, any number of repetitions, as few as possibleDi2015NewLine///          Conditional Expression with "Yes" clause onlyDi2015NewLine///              Did the capture named [counter] match?Di2015NewLine///              If yes, search for [(?!)]Di2015NewLine///                  Match if suffix is absent. []Di2015NewLine///                      NULLDi2015NewLine///  \\r\\nDi2015NewLine///      Carriage returnDi2015NewLine///      New lineDi2015NewLine///  Di2015NewLine///Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLineRegex regex = new Regex(Di2015NewLine      "((?<counter>\\").*?(?<-counter>\\").*?(?(counter)(?!)))\\\\r\\\\n",Di2015NewLine    RegexOptions.CultureInvariantDi2015NewLine    | RegexOptions.CompiledDi2015NewLine    | RegexOptions.SinglelineDi2015NewLine    );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestring input = "INSERT INTO blah VALUES \\" blah blah \\r\\n \\" \\r\\n (here can be anything like several new lines and \\t tabs) INSERT INTO blah VALUES \\" blah blah \\r\\n \\" \\r\\n";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestring output output=regex.Replace(input,"$1\\n");Di2015NewLine

12181661Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic string ToSI(double d, string format = null)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    char[] incPrefixes = new[] { 'k', 'M', 'G', 'T', 'P', 'E', 'Z', 'Y' };Di2015NewLine    char[] decPrefixes = new[] { 'm', '\\u03bc', 'n', 'p', 'f', 'a', 'z', 'y' };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int degree = (int)Math.Floor(Math.Log10(Math.Abs(d)) / 3);Di2015NewLine    double scaled = d * Math.Pow(1000, -degree);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    char? prefix = null;Di2015NewLine    switch (Math.Sign(degree))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        case 1:  prefix = incPrefixes[degree - 1]; break;Di2015NewLine        case -1: prefix = decPrefixes[-degree - 1]; break;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return scaled.ToString(format) + prefix;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12186197Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string HexToString(string hex)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  var sb = new StringBuilder();//to hold our result;Di2015NewLine  for(int i = 0; i < hex.Length; i+=2)//chunks of two - I'm just going to let an exception happen if there is an odd-length input, or any other errorDi2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    string hexdec = hex.Substring(i, 2);//string of one octet in hexDi2015NewLine    int number = int.Parse(hexdec, NumberStyles.HexNumber);//the number the hex representedDi2015NewLine    char charToAdd = (char)number;//coerce into a characterDi2015NewLine    sb.Append(charToAdd);//add it to the string being builtDi2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  return sb.ToString();//the string we built up.Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12186602Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<List<T>> Chunk<T>(IEnumerable<T> source, int chunkSize)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  List<T> list = new List<T>(chunkSize);Di2015NewLine  foreach(T item in source)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    list.Add(item);Di2015NewLine    if(list.Count == chunkSize)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      yield return list;Di2015NewLine      list = new List<T>(chunkSize);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  //don't forget the last one!Di2015NewLine  if(list.Count != 0)Di2015NewLine    yield return list;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12188327Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static BigInteger Ackermann(BigInteger m, BigInteger n)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (m == 0)Di2015NewLine            return  n+1;Di2015NewLine        if (n == 0)Di2015NewLine            return Ackermann(m - 1, 1);Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            return Ackermann(m - 1, Ackermann(m, n - 1));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

12188327Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static BigInteger Ackermann(BigInteger m, BigInteger n)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    restart:Di2015NewLine        if (m == 0)Di2015NewLine            return  n+1;Di2015NewLine        if (n == 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            m--;Di2015NewLine            n = 1;Di2015NewLine            goto restart;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            return Ackermann(m - 1, Ackermann(m, n - 1));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

12188327Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static BigInteger Ackermann(BigInteger m, BigInteger n)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Stack<BigInteger> stack = new Stack<BigInteger>();Di2015NewLine        stack.Push(m);Di2015NewLine        while(stack.Count != 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            m = stack.Pop();Di2015NewLine            if(m == 0)Di2015NewLine                n = n + 1;Di2015NewLine            else if(n == 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                stack.Push(m - 1);Di2015NewLine                n = 1;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                stack.Push(m - 1);Di2015NewLine                stack.Push(m);Di2015NewLine                --n;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return n;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

12188327Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static BigInteger Ackermann(BigInteger m, BigInteger n)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Stack<BigInteger> stack = new Stack<BigInteger>();Di2015NewLine        stack.Push(m);Di2015NewLine        while(stack.Count != 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            m = stack.Pop();Di2015NewLine        skipStack:Di2015NewLine            if(m == 0)Di2015NewLine                n = n + 1;Di2015NewLine            else if(n == 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                --m;Di2015NewLine                n = 1;Di2015NewLine                goto skipStack;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                stack.Push(m - 1);Di2015NewLine                --n;Di2015NewLine                goto skipStack;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return n;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
12188327Di2015UniqueSeparatorgoto
12188327Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static BigInteger Ackermann(BigInteger m, BigInteger n)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Stack<BigInteger> stack = new Stack<BigInteger>();Di2015NewLine        stack.Push(m);Di2015NewLine        while(stack.Count != 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            m = stack.Pop();Di2015NewLine        skipStack:Di2015NewLine            if(m == 0)Di2015NewLine                n = n + 1;Di2015NewLine            else if(m == 1)Di2015NewLine                n = n + 2;Di2015NewLine            else if(m == 2)Di2015NewLine                n = n * 2 + 3;Di2015NewLine            else if(n == 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                --m;Di2015NewLine                n = 1;Di2015NewLine                goto skipStack;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                stack.Push(m - 1);Di2015NewLine                --n;Di2015NewLine                goto skipStack;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return n;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

12188327Di2015UniqueSeparatorStack<T>
12188327Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class OverflowlessStack <T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    internal sealed class SinglyLinkedNodeDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //Larger the better, but we want to be low enoughDi2015NewLine        //to demonstrate the case where we overflow a nodeDi2015NewLine        //and hence create another.Di2015NewLine        private const int ArraySize = 2048;Di2015NewLine        T [] _array;Di2015NewLine        int _size;Di2015NewLine        public SinglyLinkedNode Next;Di2015NewLine        public SinglyLinkedNode()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _array = new T[ArraySize];Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        public bool IsEmpty{ get{return _size == 0;} }Di2015NewLine        public SinglyLinkedNode Push(T item)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if(_size == ArraySize - 1)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                SinglyLinkedNode n = new SinglyLinkedNode();Di2015NewLine                n.Next = this;Di2015NewLine                n.Push(item);Di2015NewLine                return n;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            _array [_size++] = item;Di2015NewLine            return this;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        public T Pop()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return _array[--_size];Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    private SinglyLinkedNode _head = new SinglyLinkedNode();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public T Pop ()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        T ret = _head.Pop();Di2015NewLine        if(_head.IsEmpty && _head.Next != null)Di2015NewLine            _head = _head.Next;Di2015NewLine        return ret;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public void Push (T item)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _head = _head.Push(item);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public bool IsEmptyDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return _head.Next == null && _head.IsEmpty; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinepublic static BigInteger Ackermann(BigInteger m, BigInteger n)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var stack = new OverflowlessStack<BigInteger>();Di2015NewLine    stack.Push(m);Di2015NewLine    while(!stack.IsEmpty)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        m = stack.Pop();Di2015NewLine    skipStack:Di2015NewLine        if(m == 0)Di2015NewLine            n = n + 1;Di2015NewLine        else if(m == 1)Di2015NewLine            n = n + 2;Di2015NewLine        else if(m == 2)Di2015NewLine            n = n * 2 + 3;Di2015NewLine        else if(n == 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            --m;Di2015NewLine            n = 1;Di2015NewLine            goto skipStack;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            stack.Push(m - 1);Di2015NewLine            --n;Di2015NewLine            goto skipStack;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return n;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12192853Di2015UniqueSeparator   public static void Save<T>(string fileName, List<T> list)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Gain code access to the file that we are goingDi2015NewLine        // to write toDi2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Create a FileStream that will write data to file.Di2015NewLine            using (var stream = new FileStream(fileName, FileMode.Create, FileAccess.Write))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var formatter = new BinaryFormatter();Di2015NewLine                 formatter.Serialize(stream, list);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine           Console.WriteLine(ex.Message);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
12192853Di2015UniqueSeparator   public static List<T> Load<T>(string fileName)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var list = new List<T>();Di2015NewLine        // Check if we had previously Save information of our friendsDi2015NewLine        // previouslyDi2015NewLine        if (File.Exists(fileName))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Create a FileStream will gain read access to theDi2015NewLine                // data file.Di2015NewLine                using (var stream = new FileStream(fileName, FileMode.Open, FileAccess.Read))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    var formatter = new BinaryFormatter();Di2015NewLine                    list = (List<T>)Di2015NewLine                        formatter.Deserialize(stream);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine(ex.Message);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return list;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

12192997Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void OptimisticalSwap(object[] arr, int i, int j, object sentinel, SpinWait spinWait)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  Interlocked.Increment(ref nSwap);Di2015NewLine  if(i == j) return;Di2015NewLine  var vi = ExchangeWithSentinel(arr, i, sentinel, spinWait);Di2015NewLine  var vj = ExchangeWithSentinel(arr, j, sentinel, spinWait);Di2015NewLine  Interlocked.Exchange(ref arr[i], vj);Di2015NewLine  Interlocked.Exchange(ref arr[j], vi);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate object ExchangeWithSentinel(object[] arr, int i, object sentinel, SpinWait spinWait)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  spinWait.Reset();Di2015NewLine  while(true) {Di2015NewLine    var vi = Interlocked.Exchange(ref arr[i], sentinel);Di2015NewLine    if(vi != sentinel) return vi;Di2015NewLine    spinWait.SpinOnce();Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12192997Di2015UniqueSeparator[TestClass]Di2015NewLine  public class ParallelShuffleDi2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    private int nSwap = 0;Di2015NewLine    private int nConflict = 0;Di2015NewLine    [TestMethod]Di2015NewLine    public void Test()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      const int size = 100000;Di2015NewLine      const int thCount = 8;Di2015NewLine      var sentinel = new object();Di2015NewLine      var array = new object[size];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      for(int i = 0; i < array.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        array[i] = i;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      for(var nRun = 0; nRun < 10; ++nRun) {Di2015NewLine        nConflict = 0;Di2015NewLine        nSwap = 0;Di2015NewLine        var sw = Stopwatch.StartNew();Di2015NewLine        var tasks = new Task[thCount];Di2015NewLine        for(int i = 0; i < thCount; ++i) {Di2015NewLine          tasks[i] = Task.Factory.StartNew(() => {Di2015NewLine            var rand = new Random();Di2015NewLine            var spinWait = new SpinWait();Di2015NewLine            for(var count = array.Length - 1; count > 1; count--) {Di2015NewLine              var y = rand.Next(count);Di2015NewLine              OptimisticalSwap(array, count, y, sentinel, spinWait);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine          }, CancellationToken.None, TaskCreationOptions.LongRunning, TaskScheduler.Default);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Task.WaitAll(tasks);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Console.WriteLine(String.Join(", ", array));Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Run {3} took {0}ms (nSwap={1}, nConflict={2})", sw.ElapsedMilliseconds, nSwap, nConflict, nRun);Di2015NewLine        // check for doubles:Di2015NewLine        var checkArray = new bool[size];Di2015NewLine        for(var i = 0; i < array.Length; ++i) {Di2015NewLine          var value = (int) array[i];Di2015NewLine          Assert.IsFalse(checkArray[value], "A double! (at {0} = {1})", i, value);Di2015NewLine          checkArray[value] = true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   private void OptimisticalSwap(object[] arr, int i, int j, object sentinel, SpinWait spinWait)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      Interlocked.Increment(ref nSwap);Di2015NewLine      if(i == j) return;Di2015NewLine      var vi = ExchangeWithSentinel(arr, i, sentinel, spinWait);Di2015NewLine      var vj = ExchangeWithSentinel(arr, j, sentinel, spinWait);Di2015NewLine      Interlocked.Exchange(ref arr[i], vj);Di2015NewLine      Interlocked.Exchange(ref arr[j], vi);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private object ExchangeWithSentinel(object[] arr, int i, object sentinel, SpinWait spinWait)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      spinWait.Reset();Di2015NewLine      while(true) {Di2015NewLine        var vi = Interlocked.Exchange(ref arr[i], sentinel);Di2015NewLine        if(vi != sentinel) return vi;Di2015NewLine        spinWait.SpinOnce();Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

12197063Di2015UniqueSeparatorGetWeekOfYear
12197063Di2015UniqueSeparatorFirstFourDayWeek
12197063Di2015UniqueSeparatorint weekNumber(DateTime fromDate)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Get jan 1st of the yearDi2015NewLine    DateTime startOfYear = fromDate.AddDays(- fromDate.Day + 1).AddMonths(- fromDate.Month +1);Di2015NewLine    // Get dec 31st of the yearDi2015NewLine    DateTime endOfYear = startOfYear.AddYears(1).AddDays(-1);Di2015NewLine    // ISO 8601 weeks start with Monday Di2015NewLine    // The first week of a year includes the first Thursday Di2015NewLine    // DayOfWeek returns 0 for sunday up to 6 for saterdayDi2015NewLine    int[] iso8601Correction = {6,7,8,9,10,4,5};Di2015NewLine    int nds = fromDate.Subtract(startOfYear).Days  + iso8601Correction[(int)startOfYear.DayOfWeek];Di2015NewLine    int wk = nds / 7;Di2015NewLine    switch(wk)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        case 0 : Di2015NewLine            // Return weeknumber of dec 31st of the previous yearDi2015NewLine            return weekNumber(startOfYear.AddDays(-1));Di2015NewLine        case 53 : Di2015NewLine            // If dec 31st falls before thursday it is week 01 of next yearDi2015NewLine            if (endOfYear.DayOfWeek < DayOfWeek.Thursday)Di2015NewLine                return 1;Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine                return wk;Di2015NewLine        default : return wk;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
12197063Di2015UniqueSeparatorfor (int i = 0; i <= 10; i++)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    DateTime currentDate = date.AddDays(i);Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("Date: {0} WeekNumber: {1}: CorrectWeekNumber: {2}",Di2015NewLine        currentDate.ToShortDateString(),Di2015NewLine        CultureInfo.CurrentCulture.Calendar.GetWeekOfYear(currentDate, weekRule, firstDayOfWeek),Di2015NewLine        weekNumber(currentDate));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

//<<======================Di2015NewLine                case ReportFormats.Pdf: return Pdf;Di2015NewLine                case ReportFormats.Xlsx: return Xlsx;Di2015NewLine                case ReportFormats.Docx: return Docx;Di2015NewLine                default : return null;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public class Report : IDisposable {Di2015NewLine        private HttpWebRequest _httpWReq;Di2015NewLine        private WebResponse _httpWResp;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public Report() {Di2015NewLine            _httpWReq = null;Di2015NewLine            _httpWResp = null;Di2015NewLine            Format = ReportFormats.Html;Di2015NewLine            Params = new Dictionary<String, String>();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public Dictionary<String, String> Params { get; }Di2015NewLine        public NetworkCredential Credentials { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //public String PostData { get { return String.Format("rs:Command=Render&rs:Format={0}", ReportFormat.ByCode(Format).Instruction); } }Di2015NewLine        public String PostData { get {Di2015NewLine            StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder(1024);Di2015NewLine            sb.AppendFormat("rs:Command=Render&rs:Format={0}", ReportFormat.ByCode(Format).Instruction);Di2015NewLine            if (Format == ReportFormats.Html) {Di2015NewLine                sb.Append("&rc:Toolbar=false");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            foreach (var kv in Params) {Di2015NewLine                sb.AppendFormat("&{0}={1}", kv.Key, kv.Value);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return sb.ToString();Di2015NewLine        } }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public String ReportFullPath { get { return ReportServerPath + "?/" +  ReportPath; } }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public Stream Render() {Di2015NewLine            _httpWReq = (HttpWebRequest)HttpWebRequest.Create(ReportFullPath);Di2015NewLine            _httpWReq.Method = "POST";Di2015NewLine            if (Credentials != null)Di2015NewLine                _httpWReq.Credentials = Credentials;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            byte[] byteArray = Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(PostData);Di2015NewLine            _httpWReq.ContentType = "application/x-www-form-urlencoded";Di2015NewLine            _httpWReq.ContentLength = byteArray.Length;Di2015NewLine            Stream dataStream = _httpWReq.GetRequestStream();Di2015NewLine            dataStream.Write(byteArray, 0, byteArray.Length);Di2015NewLine            dataStream.Close();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (_httpWResp != null )Di2015NewLine                _httpWResp.Close();Di2015NewLine                            _httpWResp = _httpWReq.GetResponse();               Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return _httpWResp.GetResponseStream();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void RenderTo(String fileName) {            Di2015NewLine            Stream receiveStream = Render();Di2015NewLine            Stream ds = File.Open(fileName, FileMode.Create);Di2015NewLine            receiveStream.CopyTo(ds);Di2015NewLine            ds.Close();Di2015NewLine            receiveStream.Close(); 12200738Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static Object LoadInfo()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // this is our semaphoreDi2015NewLine    var blocker = new AutoResetEvent();Di2015NewLine    object result = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var service = new SomeWcfService();Di2015NewLine    // use a lambda instead of a method as the callback.Di2015NewLine    // this will result in a closure where we can access the result and blocker variablesDi2015NewLine    service.BeginGetInfo(x => Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // We are on a different thread within this lambdaDi2015NewLine        result = (x.AsyncState as SomeWcfService).EndGetInfo(ar);Di2015NewLine        // release anybody calling blocker.WaitOneDi2015NewLine        blocker.Set(); Di2015NewLine    }, service);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // we are still on the original thread here, andDi2015NewLine    // BeginGetInfo has possibly not yet executed, so we must wait until Set is calledDi2015NewLine    blocker.WaitOne(Timeout.Infinite); Di2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
12200738Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void LoadInfo()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Makes the UI show a loading indicator, blocking all actions except for CANCELDi2015NewLine    LoadingInfo = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var service = new SomeWcfService();Di2015NewLine    service.BeginGetInfo(CallbackMethod, service);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void CallbackMethod(IAsyncResult ar)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // the UI is now released from loading Di2015NewLine    LoadingInfo = false;Di2015NewLine    // the UI is triggered to show our dataDi2015NewLine    ViewModel.Data = (ar.AsyncState as SomeWcfService).EndGetInfo(ar);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12203764Di2015UniqueSeparator    void Application_Error(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  // Code that runs when an unhandled error occursDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // Get the exception object.Di2015NewLine  Exception exc = Server.GetLastError();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // Handle HTTP errorsDi2015NewLine  if (exc.GetType() == typeof(HttpException))Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    // The Complete Error Handling Example generatesDi2015NewLine    // some errors using URLs with "NoCatch" in them;Di2015NewLine    // ignore these here to simulate what would happenDi2015NewLine    // if a global.asax handler were not implemented.Di2015NewLine      if (exc.Message.Contains("NoCatch") || exc.Message.Contains("maxUrlLength"))Di2015NewLine      return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Redirect HTTP errors to HttpError pageDi2015NewLine    Server.Transfer("HttpErrorPage.aspx");Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // For other kinds of errors give the user some informationDi2015NewLine  // but stay on the default pageDi2015NewLine  Response.Write("<h2>Global Page Error</h2>\\n");Di2015NewLine  Response.Write(Di2015NewLine      "<p>" + exc.Message + "</p>\\n");Di2015NewLine  Response.Write("Return to the <a href='Default.aspx'>" +Di2015NewLine      "Default Page</a>\\n");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // Log the exception and notify system operatorsDi2015NewLine  ExceptionUtility.LogException(exc, "DefaultPage");Di2015NewLine  ExceptionUtility.NotifySystemOps(exc);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // Clear the error from the serverDi2015NewLine  Server.ClearError();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12209946Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void Draw(Matrix projection, Matrix view)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Copy any parent transforms.Di2015NewLine    var transforms = new Matrix[model.Bones.Count];Di2015NewLine    model.CopyAbsoluteBoneTransformsTo(transforms);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (var mesh in model.Meshes)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // This is where the mesh orientation is set, as well Di2015NewLine        // as our camera and projection.Di2015NewLine        foreach (BasicEffect effect in mesh.Effects)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Matrix world = Orientation; // <- A Matrix that is the orientationDi2015NewLine            world.Translation = Position; // <- A Vector3D representing positionDi2015NewLine            effect.World = transforms[mesh.ParentBone.Index] *Di2015NewLine                world;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            effect.View = view;Di2015NewLine            effect.Projection = projection;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        // Draw the mesh, using the effects set above.Di2015NewLine        mesh.Draw();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12218749Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate int ReverseModulus(int div, int a, int remainder)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   if(remainder >= div)Di2015NewLine      throw new ArgumentException("Remainder cannot be greater than or equal to divisor");Di2015NewLine   if(a < remainder)Di2015NewLine      return remainder - a;Di2015NewLine   return div + remainder - a;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
12218749Di2015UniqueSeparator// (53 + x) % 62 = 44Di2015NewLinevar res = ReverseModulus(62,53,44); // res = 53Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// (2 + x) % 8 = 3Di2015NewLinevar res = ReverseModulus(8,2,3); // res = 1Di2015NewLine

12222670Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.IO;Di2015NewLineusing System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Binary;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace SerializationExampleDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string[] FileNames = new string[] {Di2015NewLine                @"model1.bin",Di2015NewLine                @"model2.bin"Di2015NewLine            };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Stream[] files = new Stream[] {Di2015NewLine                File.Create(FileNames[0]),Di2015NewLine                File.Create(FileNames[1])Di2015NewLine            };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            BinaryFormatter bf = new BinaryFormatter();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Model m1 = new Model();Di2015NewLine            m1.B = new AnotherClass("Set in app");Di2015NewLine            m1.A.Value = "Set in app";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Model m2 = new Model();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("M1:\\n{0}\\n", m1);Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("M2:\\n{0}\\n\\n", m2);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            bf.Serialize(files[0], m1);Di2015NewLine            bf.Serialize(files[1], m2);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (var f in files)Di2015NewLine                f.Seek(0, SeekOrigin.Begin);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            m1 = null;Di2015NewLine            m2 = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            m1 = (Model)bf.Deserialize(files[0]);Di2015NewLine            m2 = (Model)bf.Deserialize(files[1]);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("M1:\\n{0}\\n", m1);Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("M2:\\n{0}\\n\\n", m2);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (var f in files)Di2015NewLine                f.Close();           Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12222778Di2015UniqueSeparatorDefaultRefreshEventListener
12222778Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary> Di2015NewLine/// Defines the default refresh event listener used by hibernate for refreshing entitiesDi2015NewLine/// in response to generated refresh events. Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLine[Serializable]Di2015NewLinepublic class DefaultRefreshEventListener : IRefreshEventListenerDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private static readonly ILog log = LogManager.GetLogger(typeof(DefaultRefreshEventListener));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public virtual void OnRefresh(RefreshEvent @event)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        OnRefresh(@event, IdentityMap.Instantiate(10));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public virtual void OnRefresh(RefreshEvent @event, IDictionary refreshedAlready)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        IEventSource source = @event.Session;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (source.PersistenceContext.ReassociateIfUninitializedProxy(@event.Entity))Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        object obj = source.PersistenceContext.UnproxyAndReassociate(@event.Entity);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (refreshedAlready.Contains(obj))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            log.Debug("already refreshed");Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        EntityEntry e = source.PersistenceContext.GetEntry(obj);Di2015NewLine        IEntityPersister persister;Di2015NewLine        object id;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (e == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            persister = source.GetEntityPersister(null, obj); //refresh() does not pass an entityNameDi2015NewLine            id = persister.GetIdentifier(obj, source.EntityMode);Di2015NewLine            if (log.IsDebugEnabled)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                log.Debug("refreshing transient " + MessageHelper.InfoString(persister, id, source.Factory));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            EntityKey key = new EntityKey(id, persister, source.EntityMode);Di2015NewLine            if (source.PersistenceContext.GetEntry(key) != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                throw new PersistentObjectException("attempted to refresh transient instance when persistent instance was already associated with the Session: " + Di2015NewLine                    MessageHelper.InfoString(persister, id, source.Factory));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (log.IsDebugEnabled)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                log.Debug("refreshing " + MessageHelper.InfoString(e.Persister, e.Id, source.Factory));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            if (!e.ExistsInDatabase)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                throw new HibernateException("this instance does not yet exist as a row in the database");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            persister = e.Persister;Di2015NewLine            id = e.Id;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // cascade the refresh prior to refreshing this entityDi2015NewLine        refreshedAlready[obj] = obj;Di2015NewLine        new Cascade(CascadingAction.Refresh, CascadePoint.BeforeRefresh, source).CascadeOn(persister, obj, refreshedAlready);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (e != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            EntityKey key = new EntityKey(id, persister, source.EntityMode);Di2015NewLine            source.PersistenceContext.RemoveEntity(key);Di2015NewLine            if (persister.HasCollections)Di2015NewLine                new EvictVisitor(source).Process(obj, persister);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (persister.HasCache)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            CacheKey ck = new CacheKey(id, persister.IdentifierType, persister.RootEntityName, source.EntityMode, source.Factory);Di2015NewLine            persister.Cache.Remove(ck);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        EvictCachedCollections(persister, id, source.Factory);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // NH Different behavior : NH-1601Di2015NewLine        // At this point the entity need the real refresh, all elementes of collections are Refreshed,Di2015NewLine        // the collection state was evicted, but the PersistentCollection (in the entity state)Di2015NewLine        // is associated with a possible previous session.Di2015NewLine        new WrapVisitor(source).Process(obj, persister);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // NH-3253: Forcing simple load to prevent the redundante instance Di2015NewLine        //on session:Di2015NewLine        //Ocurre when:Di2015NewLine        // -there is a 'one-to-many' 'Parent-Child' relationship;Di2015NewLine        // -AND the 'Parent' 'many-to-one' association is ' fetch="select" ';Di2015NewLine        // -AND 'Child' is using a 'composite-id' and 'key-many-to-one' to theDi2015NewLine        //'Parent'.Di2015NewLine        object result;Di2015NewLine        if (this.IsReferencedByCompositeId(persister))Di2015NewLine            result = persister.Load(id, obj, @event.LockMode, source);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string previousFetchProfile = source.FetchProfile;Di2015NewLine        source.FetchProfile = "refresh";Di2015NewLine        result = persister.Load(id, obj, @event.LockMode, source);Di2015NewLine        source.FetchProfile = previousFetchProfile;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // NH Different behavior : we are ignoring transient entities without throw any kind of exception Di2015NewLine        // because a transient entity is "self refreshed"Di2015NewLine        if (!ForeignKeys.IsTransient(persister.EntityName, obj, result == null, @event.Session))Di2015NewLine            UnresolvableObjectException.ThrowIfNull(result, id, persister.EntityName);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private Dictionary<EntityMetamodel, bool> IsReferencedByCompositeIdCache = new Dictionary<EntityMetamodel, bool>();Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Returns <c>true</c> if the entity in <paramref name="persister"/> Di2015NewLine    /// ('root') has a direct or indirect association with another Di2015NewLine    /// entity that is associated back to 'root' through a 'composit-id' and Di2015NewLine    /// 'key-many-to-one'.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="persister"></param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine    private bool IsReferencedByCompositeId(IEntityPersister persister)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            bool result = false;Di2015NewLine            if (IsReferencedByCompositeIdCache.ContainsKey(persister.EntityMetamodel))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                result = this.IsReferencedByCompositeIdCache[persister.EntityMetamodel];Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                EntityMetamodel em =Di2015NewLine                    this.GetReferrerByCompositeId(Di2015NewLine                        persister.EntityMetamodel,Di2015NewLine                        persister.EntityMetamodel,Di2015NewLine                        false,Di2015NewLine                        new Iesi.Collections.Generic.HashedSet<EntityMetamodel>());Di2015NewLine                if (em == null)Di2015NewLine                    result = false;Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                    result = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                lock (this)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    this.IsReferencedByCompositeIdCache[persister.EntityMetamodel] = result;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return result;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            log.Error("Unespected ERROR!", ex);Di2015NewLine            throw;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Recursive Helper for <see cref="IsReferencedByCompositeId(IEntityPersister)"/>.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="rootEM"></param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="nestedEM"></param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="neestedIsCompositeId"></param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="visitedList"></param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine    private EntityMetamodel GetReferrerByCompositeId(Di2015NewLine        EntityMetamodel rootEM,Di2015NewLine        EntityMetamodel nestedEM,Di2015NewLine        bool neestedIsCompositeId,Di2015NewLine        ICollection<EntityMetamodel> visitedList)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        EntityMetamodel emResult = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (visitedList.Contains(nestedEM))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return emResult;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            visitedList.Add(nestedEM);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            ISessionFactoryImplementor sessionImplementor = rootEM.SessionFactory;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (nestedEM.IdentifierProperty.Type is IAbstractComponentType)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                IAbstractComponentType componentType = (IAbstractComponentType)nestedEM.IdentifierProperty.Type;Di2015NewLine                for (int i = 0; i < componentType.Subtypes.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    IType subType = componentType.Subtypes[i];Di2015NewLine                    if (!subType.IsAnyTypeDi2015NewLine                        && subType.IsAssociationTypeDi2015NewLine                        && subType is IAssociationType)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        IAssociationType associationType = (IAssociationType)subType;Di2015NewLine                        string associatedEntityName = null;Di2015NewLine                        tryDi2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            //for 'Collection Types', sometimes 'Element Type' is not an 'Entity Type'Di2015NewLine                            associatedEntityName = associationType.GetAssociatedEntityName(sessionImplementor);Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                        catch (MappingException me)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            //I think it will never happen because a Di2015NewLine                            //"Composit Id" can not have a property that Di2015NewLine                            //uses 'NHibernate.Type.CollectionType'. Di2015NewLine                            //But just in case ...Di2015NewLine                            if (log.IsDebugEnabled)Di2015NewLine                                log.Debug("Can not perform 'GetAssociatedEntityName'. " +Di2015NewLine                                    "Considering it is not an entity type: '" +Di2015NewLine                                    nestedEM.IdentifierProperty.Name + "." +Di2015NewLine                                    componentType.PropertyNames[i] + "'"Di2015NewLine                                    , me);Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                        if (associatedEntityName != null)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            IEntityPersister persisterNextNested = sessionImplementor.GetEntityPersister(associatedEntityName);Di2015NewLine                            if (rootEM == persisterNextNested.EntityMetamodel)Di2015NewLine                            {Di2015NewLine                                emResult = nestedEM;Di2015NewLine                                return emResult;Di2015NewLine                            }Di2015NewLine                            elseDi2015NewLine                            {Di2015NewLine                                emResult = this.GetReferrerByCompositeId(Di2015NewLine                                    rootEM,Di2015NewLine                                    persisterNextNested.EntityMetamodel,Di2015NewLine                                    true,Di2015NewLine                                    visitedList);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                                if (emResult != null)Di2015NewLine                                    return emResult;Di2015NewLine                            }Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < nestedEM.Properties.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                StandardProperty property = nestedEM.Properties[i];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (!property.Type.IsAnyTypeDi2015NewLine                    && property.Type.IsAssociationTypeDi2015NewLine                    && property.Type is IAssociationType)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    IAssociationType associationType = (IAssociationType)property.Type;Di2015NewLine                    string associatedEntityName = null;Di2015NewLine                    tryDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        //for 'Collection Types', sometimes 'Element Type' is not an 'Entity Type'Di2015NewLine                        associatedEntityName = associationType.GetAssociatedEntityName(sessionImplementor);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    catch (MappingException me)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        if (log.IsDebugEnabled)Di2015NewLine                            log.Debug("Can not perform 'GetAssociatedEntityName'. " +Di2015NewLine                                    "Considering it is not an entity type: '" +Di2015NewLine                                    nestedEM.EntityType.Name + "." +Di2015NewLine                                    nestedEM.PropertyNames[i] + "'",Di2015NewLine                                me);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    if (associatedEntityName != null)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        IEntityPersister persisterNextNested = sessionImplementor.GetEntityPersister(associatedEntityName);Di2015NewLine                        emResult = this.GetReferrerByCompositeId(Di2015NewLine                            rootEM,Di2015NewLine                            persisterNextNested.EntityMetamodel,Di2015NewLine                            false,Di2015NewLine                            visitedList);Di2015NewLine                        if (emResult != null)Di2015NewLine                            return emResult;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Evict collections from the factory-level cacheDi2015NewLine    private void EvictCachedCollections(IEntityPersister persister, object id, ISessionFactoryImplementor factory)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        EvictCachedCollections(persister.PropertyTypes, id, factory);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void EvictCachedCollections(IType[] types, object id, ISessionFactoryImplementor factory)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < types.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (types[i].IsCollectionType)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                factory.EvictCollection(((CollectionType)types[i]).Role, id);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else if (types[i].IsComponentType)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                IAbstractComponentType actype = (IAbstractComponentType)types[i];Di2015NewLine                EvictCachedCollections(actype.Subtypes, id, factory);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

source.DefaultReadOnly);Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        object obj =        log.Debug("refreshing transient " + MessageHelper.InfoString(persister, id, source.Factory));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            EntityKey key = new EntityKey(id, persister,            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (log.IsDebugEnabled)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine {Di2015NewLine                throw new HibernateException("this instance does not yet exist as a row in the database");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            persister =          if (persister.HasCollections)Di2015NewLine                new EvictVisitor(source).Process(obj, persister);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (persister.HasCache)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            CacheKey ck = new CacheKey(id, persister.IdentifierType, persister.RootEntityName, source.EntityMode, source.Factory);Di2015NewLine            persister.Cache.Remove(ck);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        EvictCachedCollections(persister, id, source.Factory);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // NH Different persister);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // NH-3253: Forcing simple load to prevent the redundante instance Di2015NewLine        //on session:Di2015NewLine        //Ocurre when:Di2015NewLine        // -there is a 'one-to-many' 'Parent-Child' relationship;Di2015NewLine        // -AND the 'Parent' 'many-to-one' association is ' fetch="select" ';Di2015NewLine        // -AND 'Child' is using a 'composite-id' and 'key-many-to-one' to theDi2015NewLine        //'Parent'.Di2015NewLine        object result;Di2015NewLine        if (this.IsReferencedByCompositeId(persister))Di2015NewLine            result = persister.Load(id, obj, @event.LockMode, source);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string previousFetchProfile = source.FetchProfile;Di2015NewLine        source.FetchProfile = "refresh";Di2015NewLine        result = persister.Load(id, obj, @event.LockMode, source);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (result != null)Di2015NewLine            if (!persister.IsMutable)Di2015NewLine                source.SetReadOnly(result, true);Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine                source.SetReadOnly(result, (e == null ? source.DefaultReadOnly : e.IsReadOnly));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        source.FetchProfile = previousFetchProfile;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // NH Different behavior : we are ignoring transient entities without throw any kind of exceptionDi2015NewLine        // because a transient entity is "self refreshed"Di2015NewLine        if (!ForeignKeys.IsTransient(persister.EntityName, obj, result == null, @event.Session))Di2015NewLine            UnresolvableObjectException.ThrowIfNull(result, id, persister.EntityName);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private this.IsReferencedByCompositeIdCache[persister.EntityMetamodel];Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                EntityMetamodel em == null)Di2015NewLine                    result = false;Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                    result = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                lock GetReferrerByCompositeId(Di2015NewLine        EntityMetamodel rootEM,Di2015NewLine        EntityMetamodel nestedEM,Di2015NewLine        bool neestedIsCompositeId,Di2015NewLine        ICollection<EntityMetamodel> visitedList)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        EntityMetamodel emResult = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (visitedList.Contains(nestedEM))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return emResult;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            visitedList.Add(nestedEM);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            ISessionFactoryImplementor sessionImplementor = rootEM.SessionFactory;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (nestedEM.IdentifierProperty.Type is IAbstractComponentType)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                IAbstractComponentType componentType = (IAbstractComponentType)nestedEM.IdentifierProperty.Type;Di2015NewLine                for (int i = 0; i < componentType.Subtypes.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    IType subType = componentType.Subtypes[i];Di2015NewLine                    if (!subType.IsAnyTypeDi2015NewLine                        && subType.IsAssociationTypeDi2015NewLine                        && subType is IAssociationType)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        IAssociationType associationType = (IAssociationType)subType;Di2015NewLine                        string associatedEntityName = null;Di2015NewLine                        tryDi2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            //for 'Collection Types', sometimes 'Element Type' is not an 'Entity Type'Di2015NewLine                            associatedEntityName = associationType.GetAssociatedEntityName(sessionImplementor);Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                        catch (MappingException me)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            //I think it will never happen because a Di2015NewLine                            //"Composit Id" can not have a property that Di2015NewLine                            //uses 'NHibernate.Type.CollectionType'. Di2015NewLine                            //But just in case ...Di2015NewLine                            if (log.IsDebugEnabled)Di2015NewLine                                log.Debug("Can not perform 'GetAssociatedEntityName'. " +Di2015NewLine                                    "Considering it is not an entity type: '" +Di2015NewLine                                    nestedEM.IdentifierProperty.Name + "." +Di2015NewLine                                    componentType.PropertyNames[i] + "'"Di2015NewLine                                    , me);Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                        if (associatedEntityName != null)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            IEntityPersister persisterNextNested = sessionImplementor.GetEntityPersister(associatedEntityName);Di2015NewLine                            if (rootEM == persisterNextNested.EntityMetamodel)Di2015NewLine                            {Di2015NewLine                                emResult = nestedEM;Di2015NewLine                                return emResult;Di2015NewLine                            }Di2015NewLine                            elseDi2015NewLine                            {Di2015NewLine                                emResult = this.GetReferrerByCompositeId(Di2015NewLine                                    rootEM,Di2015NewLine                                    persisterNextNested.EntityMetamodel,Di2015NewLine                                    true,Di2015NewLine                                    visitedList);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                                if (emResult != null)Di2015NewLine                                    return emResult;Di2015NewLine                            }Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < nestedEM.Properties.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                StandardProperty property = nestedEM.Properties[i];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (!property.Type.IsAnyTypeDi2015NewLine                    && property.Type.IsAssociationTypeDi2015NewLine                    && property.Type is IAssociationType)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    IAssociationType associationType = (IAssociationType)property.Type;Di2015NewLine                    string associatedEntityName = null;Di2015NewLine                    tryDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        //for 'Collection Types', sometimes 'Element Type' is not an 'Entity Type'Di2015NewLine                        associatedEntityName = associationType.GetAssociatedEntityName(sessionImplementor);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    catch (MappingException me)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        if (log.IsDebugEnabled)Di2015NewLine                            log.Debug("Can not perform 'GetAssociatedEntityName'. " +Di2015NewLine                                    "Considering it is not an entity type: '" +Di2015NewLine                                    nestedEM.EntityType.Name + "." +Di2015NewLine                                    nestedEM.PropertyNames[i] + "'",Di2015NewLine                                me);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    if (associatedEntityName != null)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        IEntityPersister persisterNextNested = sessionImplementor.GetEntityPersister(associatedEntityName);Di2015NewLine                        emResult = this.GetReferrerByCompositeId(Di2015NewLine                            rootEM,Di2015NewLine                            persisterNextNested.EntityMetamodel,Di2015NewLine                            false,Di2015NewLine                            visitedList);Di2015NewLine                        if (emResult != null)Di2015NewLine                            return emResult;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Evict collections from the factory-level cacheDi2015NewLine    private void EvictCachedCollections(IEntityPersister persister, object id, ISessionFactoryImplementor factory)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        EvictCachedCollections(persister.PropertyTypes, id, factory);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void EvictCachedCollections(IType[] types, object id, ISessionFactoryImplementor factory)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < types.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (types[i].IsCollectionType)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                factory.EvictCollection(((CollectionType)types[i]).Role, id);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else if (types[i].IsComponentType)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                IAbstractComponentType actype = (IAbstractComponentType)types[i];Di2015NewLine                EvictCachedCollections(actype.Subtypes, id, factory);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12223697Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static void ExecuteWithDeadlockRetry(int maxRetries, bool useTransaction, Action action)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int tryCount = 0;Di2015NewLine    string errorMessage;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // If use transaction is true and there is an existing ambient transaction (means we're in a transaction already)Di2015NewLine    // then it will not do any good to attempt any retries, so set max retry limit to 1.Di2015NewLine    if (useTransaction && Transaction.Current != null) { maxRetries = 1; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    doDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // increment the try count...Di2015NewLine            tryCount++;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (useTransaction)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // execute the action inside a transaction...Di2015NewLine                using (TransactionScope transactionScope = new TransactionScope())Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    action();Di2015NewLine                    transactionScope.Complete();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine                action();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // If here, execution was successful, so we can return...Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (SqlException sqlException)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (sqlException.Number == (int)SqlExceptionNumber.Deadlock && tryCount < maxRetries)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Log error hereDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                throw;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    } while (tryCount <= maxRetries);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
12223697Di2015UniqueSeparatorSqlDeadlockHelper.Execute(() =>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  // Code to execute hereDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
