12227360Di2015UniqueSeparatorAuthority: application:///Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinePath: The name of a resource file that is compiled into a referenced assembly. The path must conform to the following format: AssemblyShortName[;Version][;PublicKey];component/PathDi2015NewLine    AssemblyShortName: the short name for the referenced assembly.Di2015NewLine    ;Version [optional]: the version of the referenced assembly that contains the resource file. This is used when two or more referenced assemblies with the same short name are loaded.Di2015NewLine    ;PublicKey [optional]: the public key that was used to sign the referenced assembly. This is used when two or more referenced assemblies with the same short name are loaded.Di2015NewLine    ;component: specifies that the assembly being referred to is referenced from the local assembly.Di2015NewLine    /Path: the name of the resource file, including its path, relative to the root of the referenced assembly's project folder.Di2015NewLine
12227360Di2015UniqueSeparatorNote: The authority component of a pack URI is an embedded URI that points to a package and must conform to RFC 2396. Additionally, the "/" character must be replaced with the "," character, and reserved characters such as "%" and "?" must be escaped. See the OPC for details.Di2015NewLine

12230564Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class MyUtilitiesDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static bool DoUpdate<T>(Di2015NewLine        this T target, T source) where T: classDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if(target == null) throw new ArgumentNullException("target");Di2015NewLine        if(source == null) throw new ArgumentNullException("source");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if(ReferenceEquals(target, source)) return false;Di2015NewLine        var props = typeof(T).GetProperties(Di2015NewLine            BindingFlags.Public | BindingFlags.Instance);Di2015NewLine        bool result = false;Di2015NewLine        foreach (var prop in props)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (!prop.CanRead || !prop.CanWrite) continue;Di2015NewLine            if (prop.GetIndexParameters().Length != 0) continue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            object oldValue = prop.GetValue(target, null),Di2015NewLine                   newValue = prop.GetValue(source, null);Di2015NewLine            if (!object.Equals(oldValue, newValue))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                prop.SetValue(target, newValue, null);Di2015NewLine                result = true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
12230564Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar a = new MyClass { Name = "abc", Age = 21 };Di2015NewLinevar b = new MyClass { Name = "abc", Age = 21 };Di2015NewLinevar c = new MyClass { Name = "def", Age = 21 };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineConsole.WriteLine(a.DoUpdate(b)); // false - the sameDi2015NewLineConsole.WriteLine(a.DoUpdate(c)); // true - differentDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineConsole.WriteLine(a.Name); // "def" - updatedDi2015NewLineConsole.WriteLine(a.Age);Di2015NewLine

12232002Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Defines an angle in RadiansDi2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLinepublic struct RadiansDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static readonly Radians ZERO_PI = 0;Di2015NewLine    public static readonly Radians ONE_PI = System.Math.PI;Di2015NewLine    public static readonly Radians TWO_PI = ONE_PI * 2;Di2015NewLine    public static readonly Radians HALF_PI = ONE_PI * 0.5;Di2015NewLine    public static readonly Radians QUARTER_PI = ONE_PI * 0.25;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #region Public MembersDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Angle valueDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public double Value;Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Finds the Cosine of the angleDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public double CosDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        getDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return System.Math.Cos(this);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Finds the Sine of the angleDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public double SinDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        getDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return System.Math.Sin(this);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// ConstructorDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="value">angle value in radians</param>Di2015NewLine    public Radians(double value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.Value = value;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Gets the angle in degreesDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>Returns the angle in degrees</returns>Di2015NewLine    public Degrees GetDegrees()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return this;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Radians Reduce()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        double radian = this.Value;Di2015NewLine        bool IsNegative = radian < 0;Di2015NewLine        radian = System.Math.Abs(radian);Di2015NewLine        while (radian >= System.Math.PI * 2)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            radian -= System.Math.PI * 2;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (IsNegative && radian != 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            radian = System.Math.PI * 2 - radian;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return radian;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #region operator overloadingDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Conversion of Degrees to RadiansDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="deg"></param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine    public static implicit operator Radians(Degrees deg)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return new Radians(deg.Value * System.Math.PI / 180);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Conversion of integer to RadiansDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="i"></param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine    public static implicit operator Radians(int i)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return new Radians((double)i);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Conversion of float to RadiansDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="f"></param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine    public static implicit operator Radians(float f)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return new Radians((double)f);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Conversion of double to RadiansDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="dbl"></param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine    public static implicit operator Radians(double dbl)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return new Radians(dbl);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Conversion of Radians to doubleDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="rad"></param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine    public static implicit operator double(Radians rad)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return rad.Value;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Add Radians and a doubleDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="rad"></param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="dbl"></param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine    public static Radians operator +(Radians rad, double dbl)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return new Radians(rad.Value + dbl);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Add Radians to RadiansDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="rad1"></param>Di2015NewLine    /// (Radians)value;Di2015NewLine        if (value is Degrees)Di2015NewLine            return (Degrees)value;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return System.Convert.ToDouble(value);Di2015NewLine 12232002Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic struct DegreesDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public double Value;       Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Degrees(double value) { this.Value = value; 12232002Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic struct PolarDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public double Radius;Di2015NewLine    public Radians Angle;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public double X { get { return Radius * Angle.Cos; } }Di2015NewLine    public double Y { get { return Radius * Angle.Sin; } }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Polar(double radius, Radians angle)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.Radius = radius;Di2015NewLine        this.Angle = angle;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Polar(Point2D point)Di2015NewLine        : this(point.Magnitude(), point.GetAngleFromOrigin())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Polar(Point2D point, double radius)Di2015NewLine        : this(radius, point.GetAngleFromOrigin())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Polar(Point2D point, Point2D origin)Di2015NewLine        : this(point - origin)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Point2D ToCartesian()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return new Point2D(X, Y);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static implicit operator Point2D(Polar polar)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return polar.ToCartesian();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static implicit operator Polar(Point2D vector)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return new Polar(vector);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12232162Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class ListExtraDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static void Resize<T>(this List<T> list, int sz, T c)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int cur = list.Count;Di2015NewLine        if(sz < cur)Di2015NewLine            list.RemoveRange(sz, cur - sz);Di2015NewLine        else if(sz > cur)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if(sz > list.Capacity)//this bit is purely an optimisation, to avoid multiple automatic capacity changes.Di2015NewLine              list.Capacity = sz;Di2015NewLine            list.AddRange(Enumerable.Repeat(c, sz - cur));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public static void Resize<T>(this List<T> list, int sz) where T : new()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Resize(list, sz, new T());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12240640Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static bool TryUpdate<TKey, TValue>(this ConcurrentDictionary<TKey, TValue> dict, TKey key, Func<TValue, TValue> updateFactory)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    TValue curValue;Di2015NewLine    while(dict.TryGetValue(key, out curValue))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if(dict.TryUpdate(key, updateFactory(curValue), curValue))Di2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine        //if we're looping either the key was removed by another thread, or another threadDi2015NewLine        //changed the value, so we start again.Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return false;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
12240640Di2015UniqueSeparatorFunc
12240640Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static bool TryUpdateOptimisitic<TKey, TValue>(this ConcurrentDictionary<TKey, TValue> dict, TKey key, Func<TValue, TValue> updateFactory)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    TValue curValue;Di2015NewLine    if (!dict.TryGetValue(key, out curValue))Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLine    dict.TryUpdate(key, updateFactory(curValue), curValue);Di2015NewLine    return true;//note we return true whether we succeed or not, see explanation below.Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
12240640Di2015UniqueSeparatorTryUpdate
12240640Di2015UniqueSeparatortrue
12240712Di2015UniqueSeparator    int[] sortArrayOfArraysLexicoGraphically(ref byte[] data) {Di2015NewLine        int[] lexicoGraphicalIndexes;Di2015NewLine        long dataSize = data.Length;Di2015NewLine        int squareRoot;Di2015NewLine        bool rowSwapped;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        squareRoot = (int)Math.Sqrt(dataSize);Di2015NewLine        lexicoGraphicalIndexes = new int[squareRoot];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for(int column = 0; column < lexicoGraphicalIndexes.Length; column++) {Di2015NewLine            lexicoGraphicalIndexes[column] = column;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        byte currentLowestRowByte = 255; //set to highest to avoid unassigned local variable error.Di2015NewLine        int previousLowestRowByte = -1; //this is only used after the second pass.Di2015NewLine        int lowestRowIndex = -1; //hopefully this won't mess anything up.Di2015NewLine        List<int> lowestRowIndexes = new List<int>();Di2015NewLine        bool stillSorting = true;Di2015NewLine        int startRow = 0; //which row to start with, as the sorting process gets more sorted this number increases.Di2015NewLine        int startColumn = 0; //first columnDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        while(stillSorting) {Di2015NewLine            //ResetsDi2015NewLine            lowestRowIndexes.Clear();Di2015NewLine            startColumn = 0;Di2015NewLine            currentLowestRowByte = 255;Di2015NewLine            lowestRowIndex = -1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //first step finds the lowest row in the first columnDi2015NewLine            for(int row = 0; row < squareRoot; row += 1) {Di2015NewLine                if(data[(row * squareRoot) + startColumn] <= currentLowestRowByte && Di2015NewLine                    data[(row * squareRoot) + startColumn] > previousLowestRowByte) {Di2015NewLine                    currentLowestRowByte = data[(row * squareRoot) + startColumn];Di2015NewLine                    lowestRowIndex = row;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Resets for next pass.Di2015NewLine            previousLowestRowByte = currentLowestRowByte;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Check if sorting process is already finished. (No matches found from step 1).Di2015NewLine            if(lowestRowIndex == -1) {Di2015NewLine                stillSorting = false;Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //second step finds all the similar rows with the current lowestRowByte.Di2015NewLine            for(int row = 0; row < squareRoot; row += 1) {Di2015NewLine                if(data[(row * squareRoot) + startColumn] == currentLowestRowByte) {Di2015NewLine                    lowestRowIndexes.Add(row);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //third step loops through all lowestRowIndexes to find which one comes first, second, third, etc...Di2015NewLine            if(lowestRowIndexes.Count > 1) {Di2015NewLine                //This sorts the same rows, rows*rows amount of times, until they are sorted correctly.Di2015NewLine                rowSwapped = true;Di2015NewLine                while(rowSwapped != false) {Di2015NewLine                    rowSwapped = false;Di2015NewLine                    for (int row = 0; row < lowestRowIndexes.Count; row++)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        if((row+1) >= lowestRowIndexes.Count)Di2015NewLine                            break;Di2015NewLine                        //Current first row byte checked with Next first row byte in lowestRowIndexes.Di2015NewLine                        //If both are equal keep going unto next column until a break is found, if any break.Di2015NewLine                        startColumn = 1;Di2015NewLine                        while(rowSwapped == false) {Di2015NewLine                            //Reached beyond the last column.Di2015NewLine                            if(startColumn == squareRoot)Di2015NewLine                                break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                            if(data[(lowestRowIndexes[row] * squareRoot) + startColumn] == data[(lowestRowIndexes[row+1] * squareRoot) + startColumn])Di2015NewLine                                startColumn++;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                            if(data[(lowestRowIndexes[row] * squareRoot) + startColumn] < data[(lowestRowIndexes[row+1] * squareRoot) + startColumn]) {Di2015NewLine                                break; //Sorted already, get out.Di2015NewLine                            } else if(data[(lowestRowIndexes[row] * squareRoot) + startColumn] > data[(lowestRowIndexes[row+1] * squareRoot) + startColumn]) {Di2015NewLine                                swapBytesRow(ref data, lowestRowIndexes[row], lowestRowIndexes[row+1], squareRoot);Di2015NewLine                                swapBytes(ref lexicoGraphicalIndexes, lowestRowIndexes[row], lowestRowIndexes[row+1]);Di2015NewLine                                rowSwapped = true; //a swap has occurred.Di2015NewLine                                break;Di2015NewLine                            }Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //forth step re-sorts all the pre-sorted lowestRowIndexes into master array, using startRow variable.Di2015NewLine                foreach(int row in lowestRowIndexes) {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    //First checks if row is already in the proper sorted location.Di2015NewLine                    if(row != startRow) {Di2015NewLine                        swapBytesRow(ref data, startRow, row, squareRoot);Di2015NewLine                        swapBytes(ref lexicoGraphicalIndexes, startRow, row);Di2015NewLine                        startRow++; //skip Rows starting from value < startRow as they are perfectly sorted.Di2015NewLine                    } else {Di2015NewLine                        startRow++; //skip Rows starting from value < startRow as they are perfectly sorted.Di2015NewLine                    }                     Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            } else {Di2015NewLine                //Only one instance of this lowestRowByte existed. so obviously this is the next best sorted match.Di2015NewLine                swapBytesRow(ref data, startRow, lowestRowIndex, squareRoot);Di2015NewLine                swapBytes(ref lexicoGraphicalIndexes, startRow, lowestRowIndex);Di2015NewLine                startRow++; //skip Rows starting from value < startRow as they are perfectly sorted.Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return lexicoGraphicalIndexes;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
12240712Di2015UniqueSeparator    public void swapBytes(ref byte[] data, long firstIndex, long secondIndex) {Di2015NewLine        byte tmpFirstByte = data[firstIndex];Di2015NewLine        data[firstIndex] = data[secondIndex];Di2015NewLine        data[secondIndex] = tmpFirstByte;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
12240712Di2015UniqueSeparator    public void swapBytes(ref int[] data, long firstIndex, long secondIndex) {Di2015NewLine        int tmpFirstByte = data[firstIndex];Di2015NewLine        data[firstIndex] = data[secondIndex];Di2015NewLine        data[secondIndex] = tmpFirstByte;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
12240712Di2015UniqueSeparator    public void swapBytesRow(ref byte[] data, int firstRowIndex, int secondRowIndex, int rowSize) {Di2015NewLine        byte[] tmpFirstRowBytes = new byte[rowSize];Di2015NewLine        //Copies full row to tmpFirstRowBytesDi2015NewLine        Buffer.BlockCopy(data, (firstRowIndex * rowSize), tmpFirstRowBytes, 0, rowSize);Di2015NewLine        //Replace first row with second row.Di2015NewLine        Buffer.BlockCopy(data, (secondRowIndex * rowSize), data, (firstRowIndex * rowSize), rowSize);Di2015NewLine        //Replace second row with tmpFirstRowBytesDi2015NewLine        Buffer.BlockCopy(tmpFirstRowBytes, 0, data, (secondRowIndex * rowSize), rowSize);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

12243936Di2015UniqueSeparator    public PointF[] convertCoords()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        float x;Di2015NewLine        float y;Di2015NewLine        PointF p;Di2015NewLine        PointF[] pointFs = new PointF[7];Di2015NewLine        int x1 = 0;Di2015NewLine        int y1 = 0;Di2015NewLine        int z1 = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        double rads = Helpers.DegreeToRadian(30);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //point 0 in isoDi2015NewLine        x = ((float)Math.Cos(rads) * xloc) + ((float)Math.Cos(rads) * yloc);Di2015NewLine        y = ((float)Math.Sin(rads) * yloc) + zloc - ((float)Math.Sin(rads) * xloc);Di2015NewLine        y = (-y) + 250;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        p = new PointF(x,y);Di2015NewLine        pointFs[0] = new PointF(p.X,p.Y);Di2015NewLine        //point 1 in isoDi2015NewLine        x1 = xloc + packingObject.Depth;Di2015NewLine        y1 = yloc;Di2015NewLine        z1 = zloc;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        x = ((float)Math.Cos(rads) * x1) + ((float)Math.Cos(rads) * y1);Di2015NewLine        y = ((float)Math.Sin(rads) * y1) + z1 - ((float)Math.Sin(rads) * x1);Di2015NewLine        y = (-y) + 250;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        p = new PointF(x, y);Di2015NewLine        pointFs[1] = new PointF(p.X, p.Y);Di2015NewLine        //point 2 in isoDi2015NewLine        x1 = xloc + packingObject.Depth;Di2015NewLine        y1 = yloc;Di2015NewLine        z1 = zloc + packingObject.Height;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        x = ((float)Math.Cos(rads) * x1) + ((float)Math.Cos(rads) * y1);Di2015NewLine        y = (-((float)Math.Sin(rads) * x1)) + ((float)Math.Sin(rads) * y1) + z1;Di2015NewLine        y = (-y) + 250;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        p = new PointF(x, y);Di2015NewLine        pointFs[2] = new PointF(p.X, p.Y);Di2015NewLine        //point 3 in isoDi2015NewLine        x1 = xloc;Di2015NewLine        y1 = yloc;Di2015NewLine        z1 = zloc + packingObject.Height;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        x = ((float)Math.Cos(rads) * x1) + ((float)Math.Cos(rads) * y1);Di2015NewLine        y = (-((float)Math.Sin(rads) * x1)) + ((float)Math.Sin(rads) * y1) + z1;Di2015NewLine        y = (-y) + 250;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        p = new PointF(x, y);Di2015NewLine        pointFs[3] = new PointF(p.X, p.Y);Di2015NewLine        //point 4 in isoDi2015NewLine        x1 = xloc;Di2015NewLine        y1 = yloc + packingObject.Width;Di2015NewLine        z1 = zloc + packingObject.Height;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        x = ((float)Math.Cos(rads) * x1) + ((float)Math.Cos(rads) * y1);Di2015NewLine        y = (-((float)Math.Sin(rads) * x1)) + ((float)Math.Sin(rads) * y1) + z1;Di2015NewLine        y = (-y) + 250;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        p = new PointF(x, y);Di2015NewLine        pointFs[4] = new PointF(p.X, p.Y);Di2015NewLine        //point 5 in isoDi2015NewLine        x1 = xloc + packingObject.Depth;Di2015NewLine        y1 = yloc + packingObject.Width;Di2015NewLine        z1 = zloc + packingObject.Height;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        x = ((float)Math.Cos(rads) * x1) + ((float)Math.Cos(rads) * y1);Di2015NewLine        y = (-((float)Math.Sin(rads) * x1)) + ((float)Math.Sin(rads) * y1) + z1;Di2015NewLine        y = (-y) + 250;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        p = new PointF(x, y);Di2015NewLine        pointFs[5] = new PointF(p.X, p.Y);Di2015NewLine        //point 6 in isoDi2015NewLine        x1 = xloc + packingObject.Depth;Di2015NewLine        y1 = yloc + packingObject.Width;Di2015NewLine        z1 = zloc;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        x = ((float)Math.Cos(rads) * x1) + ((float)Math.Cos(rads) * y1);Di2015NewLine        y = (-((float)Math.Sin(rads) * 12244465Di2015UniqueSeparator public class MessageDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// The name who will receive this message.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        public string RecipientName { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// The message content.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        public string MessageContent { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
12244465Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class ClientDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private ManualResetEvent messageEvent = new ManualResetEvent(false);Di2015NewLine        private Queue<Message> messageQueue = new Queue<Message>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// This method is called by a sender to send a message to this client.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="message">the new message</param>Di2015NewLine        public void EnqueueMessage(Message message)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            lock (messageQueue)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                messageQueue.Enqueue(message);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Set a new message event.Di2015NewLine                messageEvent.Set();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// This method is called by the client to receive messages from the message queue.Di2015NewLine        /// If no message, it will wait until a new message is inserted.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <returns>the unread message</returns>Di2015NewLine        public Message DequeueMessage()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Wait until a new message.Di2015NewLine            messageEvent.WaitOne();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            lock (messageQueue)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (messageQueue.Count == 1)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    messageEvent.Reset();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                return messageQueue.Dequeue();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
12244465Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class ClientAdapterDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// The recipient list.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        private Dictionary<string, Client> recipients = new Dictionary<string,Client>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Send a message to a particular recipient.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        public void SendMessage(Message message)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (recipients.ContainsKey(message.RecipientName))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Client client = recipients[message.RecipientName];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                client.EnqueueMessage(message);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Called by a individual recipient to wait and receive a message.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <returns>The message content</returns>Di2015NewLine        public string GetMessage(string userName)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string messageContent = string.Empty;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (recipients.ContainsKey(userName))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Client client = recipients[userName];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                messageContent = client.DequeueMessage().MessageContent;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return messageContent;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Join a user to the recipient list.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        public void Join(string userName)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            recipients[userName] = new Client();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Singleton pattern.Di2015NewLine        /// This pattern will ensure there is only one instance of this class in the system.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        public static ClientAdapter Instance = new ClientAdapter();Di2015NewLine        private ClientAdapter() { }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
12244465Di2015UniqueSeparator    Message message = new MessageDi2015NewLine                                      {Di2015NewLine                                          RecipientName = tbRecipientName.Text.Trim(),Di2015NewLine                                          MessageContent = tbMessageContent.Text.Trim()Di2015NewLine                                      };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (!string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(message.RecipientName) && !string.IsNullOrEmpty(message.MessageContent))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // Call the client adapter to send the message to the particular recipient instantly.Di2015NewLine                    ClientAdapter.Instance.SendMessage(message);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
12244465Di2015UniqueSeparator // This method will persist a http request and wait for messages.Di2015NewLine        function waitEvent() {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            CSASPNETReverseAJAX.Dispatcher.WaitMessage("<%= Session["userName"] %>", Di2015NewLine            function (result) {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                displayMessage(result);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Keep looping.Di2015NewLine                setTimeout(waitEvent, 0);Di2015NewLine            }, function () {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Keep looping.Di2015NewLine                setTimeout(waitEvent, 0);Di2015NewLine            });Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Append a message content to the result panel.Di2015NewLine        function displayMessage(message) {Di2015NewLine            var panel = document.getElementById("<%= lbMessages.ClientID %>");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            panel.innerHTML += currentTime() + ": " + message + "<br />";Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Return a current time string.Di2015NewLine        function currentTime() {Di2015NewLine            var currentDate = new Date();Di2015NewLine            return currentDate.getHours() + ":" + currentDate.getMinutes() + ":" + currentDate.getSeconds();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

12244726Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar selectionDate = new DateTime(2012,8,29);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar serialNumbers = from sn in code Di2015NewLine            where DateTime.Parse(Di2015NewLine                         sn.Trim().Substring(sn.Trim().Length-8,8), Di2015NewLine                         new DateTimeFormatInfo {ShortDatePattern="dd/MM/yy"}) == Di2015NewLine                              selectionDate;Di2015NewLine             group sn by sn.Substring(0, 10) into g Di2015NewLine             select new { Key = g.Key,  Di2015NewLine                          Cnt = g.Count(),  Di2015NewLine                          Min = g.Min(v => v.Substring(10)),  Di2015NewLine                          Max = g.Max(v => v.Substring(10)) }; Di2015NewLine

12247911Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void InvokeLoadDevices()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Get list of physical and logical devicesDi2015NewLine    List<PhysicalDevice> devices = GetDiskDevices();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Check if calling this method is not thread safe and calling Invoke is requiredDi2015NewLine    if (trvDevices.InvokeRequired)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        trvDevices.Invoke((MethodInvoker)(() => LoadDevices(devices)));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        LoadDevices(devices);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12248068Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic interface IHandlerOf<T> where T : ComponentDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    void DoWork(T component);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
12248068Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class DbComponentHandler : IHandlerOf<DbComponent>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public void DoWork(DbComponent component)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // do db specific information hereDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
12248068Di2015UniqueSeparatorforeach (Component component in ComponentList)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    handler.DoWork(component);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
12248068Di2015UniqueSeparator//maps handlers to componentsDi2015NewLinevar service = new ComponentService();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// register all handlers in the current assemblyDi2015NewLineservice.Register(Assembly.GetExecutingAssembly());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// fake a componentDi2015NewLinevar dbComponent = new DbComponent();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// the cool part, the invoker doesn't have to knowDi2015NewLine// about the handlers = facade patternDi2015NewLineservice.Invoke(dbComponent);Di2015NewLine
12248068Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class ComponentServiceDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly Dictionary<Type, IHandlerInvoker> _handlers = new Dictionary<Type, IHandlerInvoker>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Register(Assembly assembly)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach (var type in assembly.GetTypes())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (type.IsInterface)Di2015NewLine                continue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (var interfaceType in type.GetInterfaces())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (!interfaceType.IsGenericType || interfaceType.GetGenericTypeDefinition() != typeof(IHandlerOf<>))Di2015NewLine                    continue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                var componentType = interfaceType.GetGenericArguments()[0];Di2015NewLine                var instance = Activator.CreateInstance(type);Di2015NewLine                var method = instance.GetType().GetMethod("DoWork", new[] { componentType });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                _handlers[componentType] = new ReflectionInvoker(instance, method);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Register<T>(IHandlerOf<T> handler) where T : ComponentDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _handlers[typeof (T)] = new DirectInvoker<T>(handler);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #region Nested type: DirectInvokerDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private class DirectInvoker<T> : IHandlerInvoker where T : ComponentDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private readonly IHandlerOf<T> _handler;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public DirectInvoker(IHandlerOf<T> handler)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _handler = handler;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #region IHandlerInvoker MembersDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void Invoke(Component component)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _handler.DoWork((T) component);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #endregionDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #region Nested type: IHandlerInvokerDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private interface IHandlerInvokerDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        void Invoke(Component component);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #region Nested type: ReflectionInvokerDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private class ReflectionInvoker : IHandlerInvokerDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private readonly object _instance;Di2015NewLine        private readonly MethodInfo _method;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public ReflectionInvoker(object instance, MethodInfo method)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _instance = instance;Di2015NewLine            _method = method;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #region IHandlerInvoker MembersDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void Invoke(Component component)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine 12248068Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic interface IHandlerOf<in T> where T : ComponentDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    void DoWork(T component);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class ComponentServiceDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly Dictionary<Type, IHandlerInvoker> _handlers = new Dictionary<Type, IHandlerInvoker>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void 12249963Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static List<string> static_strings = new List<string>();//this won't beDi2015NewLine                                                                //collected unless weDi2015NewLine                                                                //assign null or anotherDi2015NewLine                                                                //List<string> to static_stringsDi2015NewLinepublic void AddOne()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  string a = new Random().Next(0, 2000).ToString();//a is in scope, it refersDi2015NewLine                                                   //to a string that won't be collected.Di2015NewLine  static_strings.Add(a);//now both a and the list are ways to reach that string.Di2015NewLine  SomeListHolder b = new SomeListHolder(static_strings);//can be collectedDi2015NewLine                                                        //right now. Nobody caresDi2015NewLine                                                        //about what an object refersDi2015NewLine                                                        //to, only what refers to it.Di2015NewLine}//a is out of scope.Di2015NewLinepublic void RemoveOne()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  if(static_strings.Count == 0) return;Di2015NewLine  a = static_strings[0];//a is in scope.Di2015NewLine  static_strings.RemoveAt(0);//a is the only way to reach that string.Di2015NewLine  GC.Collect();//Do not try this at home.Di2015NewLine  //a is in scope here, which means that we can write some code hereDi2015NewLine  //that uses a. However, garbage collection does not depend upon what weDi2015NewLine  //could write, it depends upon what we did write. Because a is noDi2015NewLine  //longer used, it is highly possible that it was collected becauseDi2015NewLine  //the compiled code isn't going to waste its time holding onto referenesDi2015NewLine  //it isn't using.Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
